The main audience are women in their 20s and 30s and the drama is mainly focused on radical feminism in Korea."}
title: It's Okay to Be Sensitive
overview: A webdrama focusing on feminism and gender issues. The main audience are women in their 20s and 30s and the drama is mainly focused on radical feminism in Korea.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Legendary Witches", "kr": "전설의 마녀", "vn": "Legendary Witches"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "The four women bond and become friends, particularly when they join the baking classes being taught by Nam Woo-suk, a hotel chef. Woo-suk is a widower who is raising his daughter alone after the death of his wife six years ago. At his father-in-law's suggestion, he became a volunteer at the local prison's vocational training center, where he meets Soo-in and begins to fall for her.", "kr": "청주여자교도소 2층 10번 방에 수감된 네 명의 수형자의 이야기를 그린 드라마", "vn": "The four women bond and become friends, particularly when they join the baking classes being taught by Nam Woo-suk, a hotel chef. Woo-suk is a widower who is raising his daughter alone after the death of his wife six years ago. At his father-in-law's suggestion, he became a volunteer at the local prison's vocational training center, where he meets Soo-in and begins to fall for her."}
title: Legendary Witches
overview: The four women bond and become friends, particularly when they join the baking classes being taught by Nam Woo-suk, a hotel chef. Woo-suk is a widower who is raising his daughter alone after the death of his wife six years ago. At his father-in-law's suggestion, he became a volunteer at the local prison's vocational training center, where he meets Soo-in and begins to fall for her.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Saimdang, Memoir of Colors", "kr": "사임당, 빛의 일기", "vn": "Saimdang, Memoir of Colors"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "An art history lecturer, unfairly disgraced for refusing to certify a suspicious painting, endeavors to set the record straight by exploring the mystery of a 16th-century artist using a diary that may lead her to the genuine painting.", "kr": "조선시대 사임당 신씨의 삶을 재해석해 그의 예술혼과 불멸의 사랑을 그린 드라마. 한국미술사 전공 시간강사 서지윤은 지도교수인 민 교수가 밀고 있는 안견의 금강산도 진위 논란에 휩싸인다. 민 교수의 심기를 건드린 지윤은 이태리 볼로냐 학회에서 낙오되고 거리를 헤매다 운명처럼 고서 한 권을 발견하는데...", "vn": "An art history lecturer, unfairly disgraced for refusing to certify a suspicious painting, endeavors to set the record straight by exploring the mystery of a 16th-century artist using a diary that may lead her to the genuine painting."}
title: Saimdang, Memoir of Colors
overview: An art history lecturer, unfairly disgraced for refusing to certify a suspicious painting, endeavors to set the record straight by exploring the mystery of a 16th-century artist using a diary that may lead her to the genuine painting.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Tamra Island", "kr": "탐나는도다", "vn": "Tamra Island"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Set in the 17th Century, Jang Beo-jin is a young female diver on Tamra Island. She doesn't particularly enjoy her situation and dreams of one day leaving the island. One day, to her shock, she discovers a young blond haired man laying on the beach. The young man's name is William and he is a shipwrecked British citizen. Another young man named Park Kyu enters the island under the disguise of one of the many convicts sent to Tamra Island. In actuality, Park Kyu is a budding government official known as a Seonbi. These three young people then become involved in a hilarious love triangle.", "kr": "정혜나 작가의 동명만화를 원작으로 한 트렌디 사극. 17세기 항해 도중 폭풍을 만난 영국인 처연 윌리엄이 탐라도(제주도)에 표류하게 되면서 벌어지는 이야기를 유쾌하게 그린 드라마다.", "vn": "Set in the 17th Century, Jang Beo-jin is a young female diver on Tamra Island. She doesn't particularly enjoy her situation and dreams of one day leaving the island. One day, to her shock, she discovers a young blond haired man laying on the beach. The young man's name is William and he is a shipwrecked British citizen. Another young man named Park Kyu enters the island under the disguise of one of the many convicts sent to Tamra Island. In actuality, Park Kyu is a budding government official known as a Seonbi. These three young people then become involved in a hilarious love triangle."}
title: Tamra Island
overview: Set in the 17th Century, Jang Beo-jin is a young female diver on Tamra Island. She doesn't particularly enjoy her situation and dreams of one day leaving the island. One day, to her shock, she discovers a young blond haired man laying on the beach. The young man's name is William and he is a shipwrecked British citizen. Another young man named Park Kyu enters the island under the disguise of one of the many convicts sent to Tamra Island. In actuality, Park Kyu is a budding government official known as a Seonbi. These three young people then become involved in a hilarious love triangle.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Dr. Champ", "kr": "닥터챔프", "vn": "Đệ Nhất Tình Yêu - Doctor Champ"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Dr. Champ is a 2010 South Korean television series about a doctor caught in a love triangle between a judo athlete and a crippled doctor who was once a speed-skating star.", "kr": "태릉선수촌을 배경으로 국가대표 담당 주치의의 눈을 통해 바라본 스포츠의 세계를 다루는 본격 휴먼 스포츠 메디컬 드라마다.", "vn": "Kim Yeon Woo là một bác sĩ thực tập chỉnh hình tại làng thể thao Quốc gia Taereung, trung tâm đào tạo vận động viên Olympic. Tại đây cô ấy rơi vào mối tình lãng mạn với vận động viên judo trẻ tên Park Ji Heon, và Lee Do Wook, một người đàn ông hay cáu kỉnh, một giám đốc trung tâm tâm thất bại, người vẫn còn bị ám ảnh bởi chấn thương của nghề nghiệp vận động viên lúc xưa, và nỗi sợ hãi đó vận đeo bám anh đến nay không thể nào xóa bỏ được. Liệu Yeaon Woo có tìm thấy được nơi gửi gắm trái tim của mình hay cứ để nó cô đơn lạnh lẽo một mình?"}
title: Dr. Champ
overview: Dr. Champ is a 2010 South Korean television series about a doctor caught in a love triangle between a judo athlete and a crippled doctor who was once a speed-skating star.

tagline: The last song sung at the end of life.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Hymn of Death", "kr": "Hymn of Death", "vn": "Thánh ca tử thần"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Based on a true story, the drama tells the tragic love story of Kim Woo Jin, a married stage drama writer, and Yun Shim Duk, Korea's first professional soprano, who meet while studying at Tokyo University in the 1920s. Yun Shim Duk's recording of \"Death Song\" became the first Korean pop song in 1926.", "kr": "조선 최초의 소프라노 윤심덕과 그의 애인이자 천재극작가인 김우진의 비극적인 사랑과 함께 알려지지 않은 김우진의 작품세계를 재조명한 드라마", "vn": "Trong thời kỳ Nhật chiếm đóng, nhà biên kịch Kim U Jin đã kết hôn đem lòng yêu ca sĩ giọng soprano Yun Sim Deok, một trong những phụ nữ thế hệ mới nổi tiếng của Hàn Quốc."}
title: Hymn of Death
overview: Based on a true story, the drama tells the tragic love story of Kim Woo Jin, a married stage drama writer, and Yun Shim Duk, Korea's first professional soprano, who meet while studying at Tokyo University in the 1920s. Yun Shim Duk's recording of "Death Song" became the first Korean pop song in 1926.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Wedding", "kr": "웨딩", "vn": "Wedding"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Wedding is an 18-episode South Korean television drama that aired on KBS2 in 2005. The series explores the relationship of a newly wed couple, showing how two people, who met and married through an arranged matchmaking, slowly develop a relationship and learn what it means to be married. Some of the issues explored include what is the most important thing in a marriage, trust and honesty between a couple, how past relationships affect present, and the role of family in a relationship. Unlike other dramas written by Oh Soo-yeon, which focused on people falling in love by fate or destiny, this one is about two people with very different personalities, values, and backgrounds, and seeing how they learn to love one another despite all of their differences.", "kr": "각기 다른 배경과 이상을 가진 남녀의 결혼, 사랑, 갈등 등을 그린 드라마", "vn": "Wedding is an 18-episode South Korean television drama that aired on KBS2 in 2005. The series explores the relationship of a newly wed couple, showing how two people, who met and married through an arranged matchmaking, slowly develop a relationship and learn what it means to be married. Some of the issues explored include what is the most important thing in a marriage, trust and honesty between a couple, how past relationships affect present, and the role of family in a relationship. Unlike other dramas written by Oh Soo-yeon, which focused on people falling in love by fate or destiny, this one is about two people with very different personalities, values, and backgrounds, and seeing how they learn to love one another despite all of their differences."}
title: Wedding
overview: Wedding is an 18-episode South Korean television drama that aired on KBS2 in 2005. The series explores the relationship of a newly wed couple, showing how two people, who met and married through an arranged matchmaking, slowly develop a relationship and learn what it means to be married. Some of the issues explored include what is the most important thing in a marriage, trust and honesty between a couple, how past relationships affect present, and the role of family in a relationship. Unlike other dramas written by Oh Soo-yeon, which focused on people falling in love by fate or destiny, this one is about two people with very different personalities, values, and backgrounds, and seeing how they learn to love one another despite all of their differences.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Nail Shop Paris", "kr": "Nail Shop Paris", "vn": "Nail Shop Paris"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A romantic comedy revolving around flower boy nail artists and the happenings around them. It will center the story of Hong Yeo Joo, the writer of an internet novel who dresses up like a boy and gets hired to work at a famous nail shop Paris filled with flower boy nail artists.", "kr": "네일샵을 중심으로 꽃미남 직원들이 펼치는 해프닝을 담은 트렌디 드라마", "vn": "A romantic comedy revolving around flower boy nail artists and the happenings around them. It will center the story of Hong Yeo Joo, the writer of an internet novel who dresses up like a boy and gets hired to work at a famous nail shop Paris filled with flower boy nail artists."}
title: Nail Shop Paris
overview: A romantic comedy revolving around flower boy nail artists and the happenings around them. It will center the story of Hong Yeo Joo, the writer of an internet novel who dresses up like a boy and gets hired to work at a famous nail shop Paris filled with flower boy nail artists.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Eccentric! Chef Moon", "kr": "유별나! 문셰프", "vn": "Đầu Bếp Lập Dị - Eccentric! Chef Moon"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Moon Seung Mo is a popular chef. Due to the sudden deaths of his parents by fire, he moves to Seoha Village. His peaceful daily life suddenly changes there with the sudden appearance of Yoo Yoo Jin. Meanwhile, Yoo Yoo Jin is a world-famous fashion designer. She works under the name of Yoo Bella. One day, she has a car accident. The car accident causes her to lose her memory completely and she ends up in Seoha Village. She acts very eccentric there and becomes a troublemaker. Due to her behavior, she picks up the nickname \"Yoobyeolna\" (\"What an eccentric\").", "kr": "별 많고 달 밝은 서하마을에서 기억을 잃고 천방지축 사고뭉치로 전락한 세계적인 패션 디자이너 유벨라가 스타 셰프인 문승모와 만나 성장과 사랑, 성공을 만들어 가는 힐링 로맨틱 코미디 드라마", "vn": "Đầu Bếp Lập Dị kể về Moon Seung Mo là một đầu bếp vô cùng nổi tiếng nhưng đã chuyển đến ngôi làng Seoha sinh sống sau khi bố mẹ anh qua đời vì hỏa hoạn. Thế rồi một ngày kia, cuộc sống yên bình êm ả của anh bị xáo trộn bởi sự xuất hiện bất ngờ của cô gái có tên Yoo Yoo Jin. Yoo Yoo Jin là một nhà thiết kế thời trang xinh đẹp và nổi tiếng thế giới. Cô làm việc dưới cái tên Yoo Bella. Bất ngờ xảy ra khi cô bị tai nạn xe hơi. Vụ tai nạn xe hơi khiến cô mất trí nhớ hoàn toàn và cuối cùng cô dọn đến làng Seoha để nghỉ dưỡng."}
title: Eccentric! Chef Moon
overview: Moon Seung Mo is a popular chef. Due to the sudden deaths of his parents by fire, he moves to Seoha Village. His peaceful daily life suddenly changes there with the sudden appearance of Yoo Yoo Jin. Meanwhile, Yoo Yoo Jin is a world-famous fashion designer. She works under the name of Yoo Bella. One day, she has a car accident. The car accident causes her to lose her memory completely and she ends up in Seoha Village. She acts very eccentric there and becomes a troublemaker. Due to her behavior, she picks up the nickname "Yoobyeolna" ("What an eccentric").

titleTranslations: {"en": "Love to Hate You", "kr": "Love to Hate You", "vn": "Ghét Mà Vẫn Yêu"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "For an attorney who despises losing to men and an A-list actor who distrusts women, love means nothing — until they're forced to date each other.", "kr": "남자에게 지기 싫어하는 변호사와 여자를 믿지 못하는 톱배우. 이들에게 사랑은 아무런 의미가 없었다. 원하지 않은 연애를 시작하기 전까진.", "vn": "Đối với một luật sư ghét việc thua đàn ông và một diễn viên hạng A không tin phụ nữ, tình yêu là chuyện hoang đường. Nhưng rồi họ buộc phải hẹn hò với nhau."}
title: Love to Hate You
overview: For an attorney who despises losing to men and an A-list actor who distrusts women, love means nothing — until they're forced to date each other.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Su Ji and U Ri", "kr": "Su Ji and U Ri", "vn": "Su Ji and U Ri"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A healing romance begins between fallen star doctor Jin Su Ji and stubborn newbie doctor Choi U Ri.", "kr": "추락한 스타 의사 진수지와 무대뽀 초짜 의사 채우리의 쌍방 치유, 정신 승리, 공감 로맨스 & 핏줄 노노! 호적 타파, 신개념 가족 만들기에 대한 이야기", "vn": "A healing romance begins between fallen star doctor Jin Su Ji and stubborn newbie doctor Choi U Ri."}
title: Su Ji and U Ri
overview: A healing romance begins between fallen star doctor Jin Su Ji and stubborn newbie doctor Choi U Ri.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Legend", "kr": "태왕사신기", "vn": "The Legend"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "This drama portrays the life of the 19th king of Goguryeo, Hwanwoong, who was sent from the heavens to make the world a better place. He falls in love with Saeoh and gives her the joojak necklace; however, Kajin becomes jealous since Saeoh has given birth to Hwanwoong's son. She takes the baby and throws him off a cliff. Saeoh, thinking that her son had died, is overcome with grief and turns into the black joojak to destroy the world. Hwanwoong is the only one who could stop her. Afterwards, Hwanwoong returns to the Heavens and prophecizes that 2000 years later, the true Joo Shin king will come to Earth. With the help of the four gods, he will rebuild Joo Shin.", "kr": "고구려 광개토태왕의 일대기를 배경으로 한 판타지 서사 무협 드라마", "vn": "This drama portrays the life of the 19th king of Goguryeo, Hwanwoong, who was sent from the heavens to make the world a better place. He falls in love with Saeoh and gives her the joojak necklace; however, Kajin becomes jealous since Saeoh has given birth to Hwanwoong's son. She takes the baby and throws him off a cliff. Saeoh, thinking that her son had died, is overcome with grief and turns into the black joojak to destroy the world. Hwanwoong is the only one who could stop her. Afterwards, Hwanwoong returns to the Heavens and prophecizes that 2000 years later, the true Joo Shin king will come to Earth. With the help of the four gods, he will rebuild Joo Shin."}
title: The Legend
overview: This drama portrays the life of the 19th king of Goguryeo, Hwanwoong, who was sent from the heavens to make the world a better place. He falls in love with Saeoh and gives her the joojak necklace; however, Kajin becomes jealous since Saeoh has given birth to Hwanwoong's son. She takes the baby and throws him off a cliff. Saeoh, thinking that her son had died, is overcome with grief and turns into the black joojak to destroy the world. Hwanwoong is the only one who could stop her. Afterwards, Hwanwoong returns to the Heavens and prophecizes that 2000 years later, the true Joo Shin king will come to Earth. With the help of the four gods, he will rebuild Joo Shin.

tagline: The bright and dazzling Millennial life
titleTranslations: {"en": "The Fabulous", "kr": "The Fabulous", "vn": "Bộ Tứ Thời Thượng"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Four best friends chase their dreams in the competitive world of fashion while juggling demanding jobs, romantic dilemmas and wild nights on the town.", "kr": "까다로운 패션의 세계를 배경으로 열정 넘치는 밀레니얼 세대의 꿈과 사랑, 우정을 다룬 로맨틱 코미디. 그곳에서 균형을 찾으려는 청춘들의 분투가 펼쳐진다.", "vn": "Bốn người bạn thân vừa theo đuổi ước mơ nơi thế giới thời trang đầy cạnh tranh, vừa xoay sở giữa công việc yêu cầu cao, rắc rối tình ái và những đêm điên cuồng trong thành phố."}
title: The Fabulous
overview: Four best friends chase their dreams in the competitive world of fashion while juggling demanding jobs, romantic dilemmas and wild nights on the town.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Bravo My Life", "kr": "Bravo My Life", "vn": "Bravo My Life"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "This drama is the story of three people, actors who fail to debut after seven years and their lives as they relate to a broadcasting station.", "kr": "열정 과다 드라마 조연출 하도나와 여왕처럼 살다 밑바닥으로 떨어진 왕년의 여배우 라라, 두 모녀의 화해와 도전, 사랑을 통해 인생의 참된 의미를 되새기는 드라마. 드라마국 조연출 도나(정유미)는 선배 동우(연정훈)의 새 드라마에 합류하게 되고,7년째 데뷔못한 범우(현우)를 배우로 만들라는 특명을 받는다. 한편 라라(도지원)는 과거가 탄로나 이혼당할 위기에 처하는데...", "vn": "This drama is the story of three people, actors who fail to debut after seven years and their lives as they relate to a broadcasting station."}
title: Bravo My Life
overview: This drama is the story of three people, actors who fail to debut after seven years and their lives as they relate to a broadcasting station.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Queen of the Ring", "kr": "반지의 여왕", "vn": "Queen of the Ring"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Nan Hee is an ugly girl and this has influenced her to become mean. One day, she receives a ring which holds a family secret. Se Gun is handsome, but he has a cold-blooded personality. Due to the magic of the ring, he declares Nan Hee as his ideal woman with a beautiful appearance.", "kr": "반지의 여왕은 2017년 3월 9일부터 MBC에서 방영된 것으로 세가지색 판타지 제 3화에 해당하는 드라마이다.", "vn": "Nan Hee is an ugly girl and this has influenced her to become mean. One day, she receives a ring which holds a family secret. Se Gun is handsome, but he has a cold-blooded personality. Due to the magic of the ring, he declares Nan Hee as his ideal woman with a beautiful appearance."}
title: Queen of the Ring
overview: Nan Hee is an ugly girl and this has influenced her to become mean. One day, she receives a ring which holds a family secret. Se Gun is handsome, but he has a cold-blooded personality. Due to the magic of the ring, he declares Nan Hee as his ideal woman with a beautiful appearance.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Counting Mx. Gye", "kr": "숫자녀계숙자", "vn": "Counting Mx. Gye"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Due to a painful memory that she had in the past, Sook-Ja Gye, developed the habit of converting everything into numbers to make decisions. Many attractive men approach her, these interactions conflict with her data-based routines and analysis. As her rigidly structured life changes, her mind also starts to change.", "kr": "빈.틈.제.로. 무결점 그녀의 숫자로맨스!", "vn": "Due to a painful memory that she had in the past, Sook-Ja Gye, developed the habit of converting everything into numbers to make decisions. Many attractive men approach her, these interactions conflict with her data-based routines and analysis. As her rigidly structured life changes, her mind also starts to change."}
title: Counting Mx. Gye
overview: Due to a painful memory that she had in the past, Sook-Ja Gye, developed the habit of converting everything into numbers to make decisions. Many attractive men approach her, these interactions conflict with her data-based routines and analysis. As her rigidly structured life changes, her mind also starts to change.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Yong Pal", "kr": "용팔이", "vn": "Thiên Tài Lang Băm"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Operating under the alias Yong-pal, a surgeon gets enmeshed in a dark conspiracy involving a chaebol heiress forcibly put in a medically induced coma.", "kr": "'장소불문 · 환자불문' 고액의 돈만 준다면 조폭도 마다하지 않는 실력 최고의 돌팔이 외과의사 '용팔이'가 병원에 잠들어 있는 재벌 상속녀 '잠자는 숲속의 마녀'를 만나며 벌어지는 이야기를 그리는 스펙터클 멜로드라마", "vn": "Kim Tae Hyun là một bác sĩ thiên tài, người gánh món nợ không hề nhỏ khi em gái phải lọc máu chạy thận hàng tuần. Để có thật nhiều tiền chi trả viện phí, Kim Tae Hyun đã làm bác sĩ gia đình, nhận những cuộc gọi bí mật, cứu chữa cho những bệnh nhân giàu có và không từ chối bất kỳ lời đề nghị nào. Một ngày, anh tới thăm khám cho bệnh nhân là người thừa kế một tập đoàn gia đình đang hôn mê tại bệnh viện, có vẻ như cô ấy bị mắc chứng bệnh bí ẩn..."}
title: Yong Pal
overview: Operating under the alias Yong-pal, a surgeon gets enmeshed in a dark conspiracy involving a chaebol heiress forcibly put in a medically induced coma.

tagline: A pink war has begun in our peaceful daily lives!
titleTranslations: {"en": "My Sweet Mobster", "kr": "놀아주는 여자", "vn": "Đầu Gấu Ngọt Ngào"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Unexpected excitement charging romance between Ji-hwan, a big build former gang member who has cleared his dark past, and Eun-ha a mini woman who plays with children for her job.", "kr": "어두운 과거를 청산한 큰형님 ‘지환’과 아이들과 놀아주는 미니언니 ‘은하’의 반전충만 설렘충전 로맨스. 동명 웹소설 원작.", "vn": "Sự phấn khích bất ngờ tạo nên mối tình lãng mạn giữa Ji-hwan, một cựu thành viên băng đảng to lớn, người đã xóa bỏ quá khứ đen tối của mình và Eun-ha, một người phụ nữ nhỏ bé chơi đùa với trẻ em vì công việc của mình."}
title: My Sweet Mobster
overview: Unexpected excitement charging romance between Ji-hwan, a big build former gang member who has cleared his dark past, and Eun-ha a mini woman who plays with children for her job.

tagline: Reborn into the family who killed me.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Reborn Rich", "kr": "Reborn Rich", "vn": "Cậu Út Nhà Tài Phiệt"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "After ten years, a loyal employee is framed for embezzlement, then murdered by his employers, only to be reborn as their youngest son, with a yearn for revenge guiding his hostile takeover. based on a hit novel.", "kr": "순양그룹 오너 일가의 충직한 비서, 윤현우. 해외로 유출된 비자금을 국내로 들여오라는 지시를 받고 임무를 수행하던 중 오너 일가에 의해 무참히 살해당한다. 그의 억울한 죽음은 끝이 아니었는데, 1987년의 대한민국, 순양그룹 오너 일가의 막내아들 진도준으로 회귀한 것! 과연 그는 복수에 성공할 수 있을까?", "vn": "Cậu Út Nhà Tài Phiệt - Reborn Rich được chuyển thể từ tiểu thuyết The Youngest Son of a Conglomerate, xoay quanh nhân vật Yoon Hyun Woo (Song Joong Ki), một thư ký của Tập đoàn Sunyang. Hyun Woo là một nhân viên trung thành, nhưng lại nhận kết cục thảm khốc bởi chính gia đình mà anh \"cúc cung tận tuỵ\". Sau khi chết thảm, Yoon Hyun Woo sống lại một lần nữa dưới thân xác Jin Do Joon, con trai út của gia đình Sunyang Group. Mang hình hài của Jin Do Joon, Yoon Hyun Woo làm việc tiếp quản công ty cũng như bắt đầu màn trả thù của mình."}
title: Reborn Rich
overview: After ten years, a loyal employee is framed for embezzlement, then murdered by his employers, only to be reborn as their youngest son, with a yearn for revenge guiding his hostile takeover. based on a hit novel.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Cinderella at 2AM", "kr": "Cinderella at 2AM", "vn": "Lọ Lem 2 Giờ Sáng"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Ha Yoon-seo has worked hard her whole life: after raising her younger brother alone, she is now a marketing manager at a credit card company. Her life takes a dramatic turn when she discovers that her boyfriend, Seo Ju-won, is the heir to the family that owns the company! Upon learning of their relationship, Ju-won's mother offers Yoon-seo money to break up with him, and Yoon-seo accepts. However, Ju-won is determined to win her back and will stop at nothing to reclaim her heart. Can Yoon-seo and Ju-won overcome obstacles and find their fairytale ending, or will reality tear them apart?", "kr": "자기 자신을 지키는 것이 우선인 평범한 여자와 사랑을 지키는 것이 자신을 지키는 것이라고 생각하는 재벌 3세 남자의 사랑 이야기. 아이고메의 동명 웹소설 원작.", "vn": "Yoon Seo thuộc type độc lập và thực tế. Mẹ của bạn trai cô yêu cầu cô chia tay cùng đề nghị sẽ cho cô 1 khoản tiền lớn. Yoon Seo tin rằng truyện cổ tích không tồn tại trong thế giới của cô và quyết định nhận tiền. Nhưng bạn trai cô lại cố gắng theo đuổi và thay đổi suy nghĩ của cô về tình yêu. Phim phát sóng song song với Hàn Quốc, độc quyền trên K+ bắt đầu từ ngày 24/8."}
title: Cinderella at 2AM
overview: Ha Yoon-seo has worked hard her whole life: after raising her younger brother alone, she is now a marketing manager at a credit card company. Her life takes a dramatic turn when she discovers that her boyfriend, Seo Ju-won, is the heir to the family that owns the company! Upon learning of their relationship, Ju-won's mother offers Yoon-seo money to break up with him, and Yoon-seo accepts. However, Ju-won is determined to win her back and will stop at nothing to reclaim her heart. Can Yoon-seo and Ju-won overcome obstacles and find their fairytale ending, or will reality tear them apart?

titleTranslations: {"en": "Possessed", "kr": "Possessed", "vn": "Possessed"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Ha Na and Doo Na were twin sisters who were very close to each other until Doo Na died a terrible death. One day, the usually bright and energetic Ha Na finds herself changing. She has superhuman strength and can do things that nobody can. Ha Na realizes that Doo Na's spirit has inhabited her body. Shin Ryu, a criminal psychoanalyst, uses Ha Na's powers to kill people that cannot be punished by the law.", "kr": "2009년 8월 5일부터 2009년 9월 3일까지 방영된 MBC 납량특집 드라마이다. 억울하게 살해된 귀신이 여고생인 여자 주인공 하나의 몸에 빙의돼 복수를 하고, 또한 그녀를 이용해 악을 응징하려던 범죄 프로파일러 신류가 악마로 변해간다는 설정", "vn": "Ha Na and Doo Na were twin sisters who were very close to each other until Doo Na died a terrible death. One day, the usually bright and energetic Ha Na finds herself changing. She has superhuman strength and can do things that nobody can. Ha Na realizes that Doo Na's spirit has inhabited her body. Shin Ryu, a criminal psychoanalyst, uses Ha Na's powers to kill people that cannot be punished by the law."}
title: Possessed
overview: Ha Na and Doo Na were twin sisters who were very close to each other until Doo Na died a terrible death. One day, the usually bright and energetic Ha Na finds herself changing. She has superhuman strength and can do things that nobody can. Ha Na realizes that Doo Na's spirit has inhabited her body. Shin Ryu, a criminal psychoanalyst, uses Ha Na's powers to kill people that cannot be punished by the law.

tagline: I ended up living with a gumiho.
titleTranslations: {"en": "My Roommate Is a Gumiho", "kr": "간 떨어지는 동거", "vn": "Bạn Cùng Phòng Của Tôi Là Hồ Ly"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "To become a human, a 999-year-old Gumiho, Shin Woo-yeo needs to fill his fox bead with human energy before he turns 1,000 years old. One day, a college girl, Lee Dam accidentally swallows Woo-yeo's fox bead.", "kr": "999살 구미호 신우여와 쿨내나는 요즘 여대생 이담이 얼떨결에 한집 살이를 하며 펼치는 977살 세대극복 로맨틱코미디.", "vn": "Bạn Cùng Phòng Của Tôi Là Hồ Ly (My Roommate is a Gumiho 2021) phim truyền hình Hàn Quốc do đạo diễn Baek Seung Ryong cầm trịch. Phim xoay quanh nữ sinh viên đại học vô tình nuốt phải quả cầu của cửu vĩ hồ khiến cô rơi vào thảm kịch chỉ sống được một nằm và quả cầu sẽ vỡ ra để ngăn cản hồ ly đó trở thành con người."}
title: My Roommate Is a Gumiho
overview: To become a human, a 999-year-old Gumiho, Shin Woo-yeo needs to fill his fox bead with human energy before he turns 1,000 years old. One day, a college girl, Lee Dam accidentally swallows Woo-yeo's fox bead.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Good Thieves", "kr": "The Good Thieves", "vn": "Trộm Tốt, Trộm Xấu"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "There are thieves who come from different backgrounds and situations, but were not born as thieves. For the most part, they lived by the rules even while growing up poor and worked hard to better their lives. They are actually generous people. But the cruel realities of society have pushed them to the edge. And to ensure that their past problems do not hamper their own children, they fight to exact revenge from those in power, search for their long-lost family members and commit one last heist to mete out justice. This TV show will entertain viewers with a story revolving around thieves from the low rungs of society who burglarize the home of powerful men in order to unmask them. They do this to put an end to those who stand above the law and get away with thievery scot-free.", "kr": "There are thieves who come from different backgrounds and situations, but were not born as thieves. For the most part, they lived by the rules even while growing up poor and worked hard to better their lives. They are actually generous people. But the cruel realities of society have pushed them to the edge. And to ensure that their past problems do not hamper their own children, they fight to exact revenge from those in power, search for their long-lost family members and commit one last heist to mete out justice. This TV show will entertain viewers with a story revolving around thieves from the low rungs of society who burglarize the home of powerful men in order to unmask them. They do this to put an end to those who stand above the law and get away with thievery scot-free.", "vn": "Nội dung xoay quanh những kẻ trộm liều lĩnh, dám gây hấn với tầng lớp thượng lưu của xã hội, một tổ chức bí ẩn, là thế lực ngầm vận hành cả nền kinh tế và chính trị của cả đất nước Hàn Quốc. Đối lập với băng nhóm tội phạm là Kang So Joo, một nữ cảnh sát điều tra xinh đẹp và đầy nhiệt huyết, sống có lý tưởng và theo đuổi công lý."}
title: The Good Thieves
overview: There are thieves who come from different backgrounds and situations, but were not born as thieves. For the most part, they lived by the rules even while growing up poor and worked hard to better their lives. They are actually generous people. But the cruel realities of society have pushed them to the edge. And to ensure that their past problems do not hamper their own children, they fight to exact revenge from those in power, search for their long-lost family members and commit one last heist to mete out justice. This TV show will entertain viewers with a story revolving around thieves from the low rungs of society who burglarize the home of powerful men in order to unmask them. They do this to put an end to those who stand above the law and get away with thievery scot-free.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Divorce Attorney Shin", "kr": "신성한, 이혼", "vn": "Luật Sư Ly Hôn Shin"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Driven by a personal tragedy, a pianist-turned-lawyer navigates the complex world of divorce — fighting for his clients to win by any means necessary.", "kr": "이혼 전문 변호사의 파란만장한 이야기를 그린 작품으로, '이혼'이라는 삶의 험난한 길 한복판에 선 이들의 이야기. 강태경의 동명 웹툰 원작.", "vn": "Một bi kịch riêng thúc đẩy người nghệ sĩ dương cầm nọ trở thành luật sư. Anh xoay xở trong thế giới ly hôn phức tạp và dốc sức giúp thân chủ chiến thắng bằng mọi giá."}
title: Divorce Attorney Shin
overview: Driven by a personal tragedy, a pianist-turned-lawyer navigates the complex world of divorce — fighting for his clients to win by any means necessary.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Twelve Nights", "kr": "열두밤", "vn": "Twelve Nights"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Yoo Kyung and and Hyun Oh surprisingly keep bumping into each other over the course of three different trips and end up spending 12 nights together. Could this be just coincidence or something much more?", "kr": "세 번의 여행 동안 열두 번의 밤을 함께 보내는 두 남녀의 여행 로맨스를 그린 드라마", "vn": "Yoo Kyung and and Hyun Oh surprisingly keep bumping into each other over the course of three different trips and end up spending 12 nights together. Could this be just coincidence or something much more?"}
title: Twelve Nights
overview: Yoo Kyung and and Hyun Oh surprisingly keep bumping into each other over the course of three different trips and end up spending 12 nights together. Could this be just coincidence or something much more?

tagline: An inescapable fate. A desire that calls for blood.
titleTranslations: {"en": "The Bequeathed", "kr": "선산", "vn": "Di sản kỳ bí"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "After the death of an unknown uncle, a woman inherits a burial ground and finds herself in the center of a string of murders and dark secrets.", "kr": "존재조차 잊고 지내던 작은아버지의 사망 후 남겨진 선산을 상속받게 된 여자. 불길한 일들이 잇달아 벌어지고, 이윽고 베일에 감춰져 있던 비밀이 세상 밖으로 드러나기 시작한다.", "vn": "Sau khi người chú xa lạ qua đời, người phụ nữ nọ thừa kế một nghĩa trang rồi trở thành tâm điểm của chuỗi án mạng và những bí mật đen tối."}
title: The Bequeathed
overview: After the death of an unknown uncle, a woman inherits a burial ground and finds herself in the center of a string of murders and dark secrets.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Green Mothers' Club", "kr": "그린마더스클럽", "vn": "Hội Những Bà Mẹ Xanh"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Five moms in a competitive grade school community keep their enemies close, and one another closer, as envy and secrets tangle and unravel their lives.", "kr": "초등커뮤니티의 민낯과 동네 학부형들의 위험한 관계망을 그리는 드라마", "vn": "“Hội Những Bà Mẹ Xanh” kể về những bà mẹ gặp gỡ và quen biết nhau khi đưa con tới học tại một ngôi trường tiểu học. Họ dường như không có điểm tương đồng về tính cách và hoàn cảnh, thậm chí mỗi người đều có những nỗi niềm riêng, nhưng lại có chung mối quan tâm về việc nuôi dạy con cái. Họ dần trở nên thân thiết khi cùng nhau trao đổi về tình mẫu tử, suy ngẫm về vai trò của một người mẹ."}
title: Green Mothers' Club
overview: Five moms in a competitive grade school community keep their enemies close, and one another closer, as envy and secrets tangle and unravel their lives.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Great Queen Seondeok", "kr": "선덕여왕", "vn": "Nữ Hoàng Seondeok"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "The life story of Queen Seondeok, the first queen of the Korean people during the Silla Dynasty.", "kr": "덕만공주가 온갖 시련과 시험을 거쳐 우리나라 최초의 여왕이자 신라 제27대 왕인 선덕여왕 자리에 오르기까지의 과정을 그린 드라마", "vn": "Khi còn nhỏ, Công chúa Deokman may mắn thoát chết trong một vụ mưu sát do Mi Sil chủ mưu. Năm 15 tuổi, biết được thân phận thực của mình, Deokman quyết định trở lại Shilla để gặp cha mẹ. Nhờ sự trợ lực của những người thân cận, Deokman đã tiêu diệt Mi Sil và trở thành Nữ hoàng đầu tiên trong lịch sử Hàn Quốc. Chính bà là người đã đặt nền móng cho sự thống nhất ba vương quốc Koguryeo, Baekje và Shilla."}
title: The Great Queen Seondeok
overview: The life story of Queen Seondeok, the first queen of the Korean people during the Silla Dynasty.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Shut Up Flower Boy Band", "kr": "닥치고 꽃미남밴드", "vn": "Ban Nhạc Mỹ Nam"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Eye Candy is a six member underground rock band led by Byung Hee. When the group transfers into the prestigious Jungsang High School, they find their rival, Strawberry Fields. This is a story about the two rock bands and how they deal with friendship, relationships, and their passion for music.", "kr": "자유분방한 고등학생 밴드 안구정화를 중심으로 패기 넘치는 청춘들의 우정과 사랑, 음악에 대한 열정을 키워나가며 벌어지는 이야기를 담은 청춘 로맨스 드라마.", "vn": "Đây là bộ phim mới xoay quanh đề tài về một band nhạc rock, vậy nên đã chọn ra những gương mặt hoàn toàn mới để tham gia diễn xuất. Tên của bộ phim là \"Ban Nhạc Mỹ Nam\" kể câu chuyện về tình bạn, niềm đam mê âm nhạc, và tình yêu xoay quanh ban nhạc gồm những anh chàng học sinh trung học đẹp trai, có tâm hồn tự do, phóng khoáng : Ji Hyuk, Hyun Soo, Ha Jin, Do Il, Kyung Jong. Dù chỉ là những nam sinh còn ngồi trên ghế nhà trường, nhưng cả năm chàng trai luôn có cùng một đam mê cháy bỏng với âm nhạc, họ thành lập ban nhạc rock underground Eye Candy và mong muốn sẽ trở nên nổi tiếng."}
title: Shut Up Flower Boy Band
overview: Eye Candy is a six member underground rock band led by Byung Hee. When the group transfers into the prestigious Jungsang High School, they find their rival, Strawberry Fields. This is a story about the two rock bands and how they deal with friendship, relationships, and their passion for music.

tagline: I'll bet everything to take my revenge on you.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Perfect Marriage Revenge", "kr": "완벽한 결혼의 정석", "vn": "Cuộc Hôn Nhân Hoàn Hảo"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Waking from a fatal accident to find herself in the past, Han Yi-joo teams up with Seo Do-guk to take revenge on the family who never loved her.", "kr": "남편과 가족에게 복수하기 위해 계약결혼을 선택한 여자 한이주와 그녀를 아내로 맞이하기 위해 계약결혼을 연기하는 남자 서도국의 아찔하고 은밀한 로맨스 복수극", "vn": "Bộ phim về cuộc sống của Han Yi Joo, một họa sĩ nghệ thuật. Cô đã được nhận nuôi bởi Han Jin Woong và Lee Jung Hye, người làm chủ của tập đoàn tài chính Hanwool. Tuy nhiên, Han Yi Joo không bao giờ được yêu thương bởi cha mẹ nuôi hoặc em gái Han Yoo Ra. Cô luôn bị cô lập khỏi gia đình. Hiện tại, Han Yi Joo đã kết hôn với Jung Se Hyeok. Tuy nhiên, cô phát hiện ra rằng chồng mình, Jung Se Hyeok, yêu em gái của cô, Han Yoo Ra, chứ không phải cô. Trong cùng ngày đó, Han Yi Joo gặp tai nạn xe hơi và qua đời. Nhưng khi Han Yi Joo tỉnh dậy, cô thấy mình đã quay trở lại thời điểm cô đính hôn với Jung Se Hyeok. Để thay đổi số phận và trả thù gia đình mình, cô quyết định chấm dứt mối quan hệ hôn nhân với Jung Se Hyeok...."}
title: Perfect Marriage Revenge
overview: Waking from a fatal accident to find herself in the past, Han Yi-joo teams up with Seo Do-guk to take revenge on the family who never loved her.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Hello, Me!", "kr": "안녕? 나야!", "vn": "Xin Chào, Tôi Ơi! - Hello, Me!"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Miserable and unsuccessful, a woman thinks she's lost all her spark — until one day, her spunky younger self appears in front of her demanding change.", "kr": "연애도 일도 꿈도 모두 뜨뜻미지근해진 37세 주인공이 세상 어떤 것도 두렵지 않았고 모든 일에 뜨거웠던 17세의 나를 만나 나를 위로해 주는 판타지 성장 로맨틱 코미디 드라마", "vn": "Xin Chào Tôi Ơi kể về Ban Ha Ni (Choi Gang Hee thủ vai) người phụ nữ vừa bước sang tuổi 37, tính tình nhút nhát và hiện đang sống độc thân. Điều kiện cuộc sống hiện tại của cô thực sự bấp bênh vì công việc mà cô đang làm có thể bị sa thải bất cứ lúc nào. Cô luôn ấp ủ cho mình một gia đình hạnh phúc, đầm ấm như bao người. Tên gọi Xin Chào Tôi Ơi là lúc Ban Ha Ni rơi vào cuộc đấu tranh nội tâm gay gắt, rối bời. Và rồi cô bất chợt gặp lại chính bản thân mình lúc 17 tuổi, đó là một cô gái trẻ đến gõ cửa nhà để rồi Ban Ha Ni nhận ra bản thân từng là một người lạc quan và tươi sáng biết bao."}
title: Hello, Me!
overview: Miserable and unsuccessful, a woman thinks she's lost all her spark — until one day, her spunky younger self appears in front of her demanding change.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Still, Marry Me", "kr": "Still, Marry Me", "vn": "Still, Marry Me"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "When three women put their careers above their personal relationships in their quest to succeed, would they change anything about their lives now that they’re in their 30s? Lee Shin Young is a reporter for the UBN broadcasting company. Jung Da Jung works as a Korean-English translator. Kim Boo Ki works as a popular restaurant consultant. The women are all 36 years old and good friends. When one gets married and discovers married life isn’t all it’s cracked up to be, another develops a condition that sidelines her career, and the other suddenly finds a baby at her doorstep, they help each other deal with the challenges facing modern career women.", "kr": "사랑을 원하는 삼십 대 여자들의 연애를 유쾌하게 다룬 드라마", "vn": "When three women put their careers above their personal relationships in their quest to succeed, would they change anything about their lives now that they’re in their 30s? Lee Shin Young is a reporter for the UBN broadcasting company. Jung Da Jung works as a Korean-English translator. Kim Boo Ki works as a popular restaurant consultant. The women are all 36 years old and good friends. When one gets married and discovers married life isn’t all it’s cracked up to be, another develops a condition that sidelines her career, and the other suddenly finds a baby at her doorstep, they help each other deal with the challenges facing modern career women."}
title: Still, Marry Me
overview: When three women put their careers above their personal relationships in their quest to succeed, would they change anything about their lives now that they’re in their 30s? Lee Shin Young is a reporter for the UBN broadcasting company. Jung Da Jung works as a Korean-English translator. Kim Boo Ki works as a popular restaurant consultant. The women are all 36 years old and good friends. When one gets married and discovers married life isn’t all it’s cracked up to be, another develops a condition that sidelines her career, and the other suddenly finds a baby at her doorstep, they help each other deal with the challenges facing modern career women.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Brewing Love", "kr": "Brewing Love", "vn": "Men Say Tình Yêu"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A heart-fluttering love story between Chae Yong-ju, a super passionate sales king at a liquor company who hides her emotions, and Yun Min-ju, a super sensitive brewery owner who is adept at catching people’s emotions.", "kr": "감정을 숨기는 게 당연한 ‘초열정’ 주류회사 영업왕 용주와 감정을 캐치하는 게 일상인 ‘초민감’ 브루어리 대표 민주의 설렘 도수 끌올 로맨스", "vn": "Chae Yong Joo, một cựu đặc nhiệm đầy nhiệt huyết, hiện là \"vua bán hàng\" của một công ty rượu. Cuộc sống của cô đảo lộn khi chi nhánh đứng trước nguy cơ đóng cửa. Nhiệm vụ của cô là bán loại bia đặc biệt của bậc thầy Yoon Min Joo, một người đàn ông sống ẩn dật. Sự xuất hiện của Yong Joo đã làm xáo trộn cuộc sống yên bình của anh."}
title: Brewing Love
overview: A heart-fluttering love story between Chae Yong-ju, a super passionate sales king at a liquor company who hides her emotions, and Yun Min-ju, a super sensitive brewery owner who is adept at catching people’s emotions.

titleTranslations: {"en": "True to Love", "kr": "보라! 데보라", "vn": "Chân Thành Với Tình Yêu"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Dating coach Bo-ra, whose relationship is failing, and prickly publisher Su-hyeok team up to save Bo-ra’s love life for the sake of her upcoming book about dating. The collaboration results in the mind game of romance.", "kr": "연애는 전략이 필요하다는 연애코치 데보라와 연애는 진정성이라는 출판 기획자 수혁이 함께 연애서를 만들면서 시작되는 과몰입 유발 로맨스", "vn": "Yeon Bo-Ra (Yoo In-Na) là một nhà văn và cô làm việc dưới bút danh Deborah. Cô ấy là tác giả của một cuốn sách bán chạy nhất về tình yêu và cô ấy cũng nổi tiếng với tư cách là một huấn luyện viên hẹn hò. Cô từng có nhiều câu nói nổi tiếng trong vai trò huấn luyện viên hẹn hò và nhận được thiện cảm từ công chúng. Trong vai Deborah, Yeon Bo-Ra trung thực, hóm hỉnh và được lòng phụ nữ. Là Yeon Bo-Ra, mọi thứ đều khác với cô ấy. Cô có quan hệ với Lee Soo-Hyeok (Yoon Hyun-Min).\n\nLee Soo-Hyeok làm công việc lập kế hoạch xuất bản. Anh ấy là một người đàn ông khó đoán. Anh ấy đôi khi dịu dàng và say đắm với phụ nữ, nhưng đôi khi thờ ơ và lạnh lùng. Tình yêu là một điều khó khăn đối với anh ấy. Anh ấy không thích Deborah, người nói như thể cô ấy biết mọi thứ về tình yêu, nhưng anh ấy bất ngờ dính líu đến cô ấy và phải đối mặt với một sự thay đổi trong cuộc đời mình."}
title: True to Love
overview: Dating coach Bo-ra, whose relationship is failing, and prickly publisher Su-hyeok team up to save Bo-ra’s love life for the sake of her upcoming book about dating. The collaboration results in the mind game of romance.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Long Time No See", "kr": "Long Time No See", "vn": "Long Time No See"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "The renowned hitman, ‘Flying Dagger,’ bumps into ‘Wild Dog,’ who happens to be a hired assassin for the mobster, ‘Black Leopard.’ While both of them try to be incognito, they cannot help falling in love with each other. However, ‘Wild Dog’ has a secret that he couldn’t confide to ‘Flying Dagger.’ After all, ‘Flying Dagger’ and ‘Wild Dog’ reveal their secret identities to each other during the fight led by their bosses. They run into danger as gangsters brand them as traitors. Will they be able to overcome obstacles and keep their love?", "kr": "The renowned hitman, ‘Flying Dagger,’ bumps into ‘Wild Dog,’ who happens to be a hired assassin for the mobster, ‘Black Leopard.’ While both of them try to be incognito, they cannot help falling in love with each other. However, ‘Wild Dog’ has a secret that he couldn’t confide to ‘Flying Dagger.’ After all, ‘Flying Dagger’ and ‘Wild Dog’ reveal their secret identities to each other during the fight led by their bosses. They run into danger as gangsters brand them as traitors. Will they be able to overcome obstacles and keep their love?", "vn": "The renowned hitman, ‘Flying Dagger,’ bumps into ‘Wild Dog,’ who happens to be a hired assassin for the mobster, ‘Black Leopard.’ While both of them try to be incognito, they cannot help falling in love with each other. However, ‘Wild Dog’ has a secret that he couldn’t confide to ‘Flying Dagger.’ After all, ‘Flying Dagger’ and ‘Wild Dog’ reveal their secret identities to each other during the fight led by their bosses. They run into danger as gangsters brand them as traitors. Will they be able to overcome obstacles and keep their love?"}
title: Long Time No See
overview: The renowned hitman, ‘Flying Dagger,’ bumps into ‘Wild Dog,’ who happens to be a hired assassin for the mobster, ‘Black Leopard.’ While both of them try to be incognito, they cannot help falling in love with each other. However, ‘Wild Dog’ has a secret that he couldn’t confide to ‘Flying Dagger.’ After all, ‘Flying Dagger’ and ‘Wild Dog’ reveal their secret identities to each other during the fight led by their bosses. They run into danger as gangsters brand them as traitors. Will they be able to overcome obstacles and keep their love?

tagline: The one hope to overturn the world.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Black Knight", "kr": "Black Knight", "vn": "Hiệp Sĩ Áo Đen"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "In a dystopian 2071 devastated by air pollution, the survival of humanity depends on the Black Knights — and they’re far from your average delivery men.", "kr": "대기 오염으로 황폐해진 2071년 디스토피아 세계. 한 난민이 막강한 힘을 자랑하는 택배기사가 되기 위해 힘겨운 싸움을 시작한다. 그래야만 식량을 구해 생존할 수 있기에.", "vn": "Ở tương lai tăm tối bị ô nhiễm không khí tàn phá, chuyện sống còn của loài người phụ thuộc vào nhóm Hiệp sĩ áo đen và họ khác xa những người giao hàng bình thường."}
title: Black Knight
overview: In a dystopian 2071 devastated by air pollution, the survival of humanity depends on the Black Knights — and they’re far from your average delivery men.

tagline: Would you join the vote?
titleTranslations: {"en": "The Killing Vote", "kr": "국민사형투표", "vn": "Lá Phiếu Tử Hình"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "People are busy watching the screen. The person wearing a mysterious mask so called 'Gaetal' appears, and the Killing Vote begins.", "kr": "악질범들을 대상으로 국민사형투표를 진행하고 사형을 집행하는 정체 미상 개탈을 추적하는 이야기를 그린 국민 참여 심판극", "vn": "The Killing Vote kể về một nhân vật bí ẩn được gọi là Gaetal, người tiến hành các cuộc điều tra qua tin nhắn văn bản để quyết định xem có nên xử tử một số tên tội phạm hung ác nhất định hay không, sau đó giết chúng dựa trên kết quả."}
title: The Killing Vote
overview: People are busy watching the screen. The person wearing a mysterious mask so called 'Gaetal' appears, and the Killing Vote begins.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Package", "kr": "더 패키지", "vn": "The Package"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A group of strangers meet as part of a sightseeing tour in France, but end up learning more about one another than the tourist spots that they visit.", "kr": "프랑스 파리를 배경으로 현지 가이드와 관광객 8명이 여행을 하며 펼치는 좌충우돌 이야기를 경쾌하게 담은 드라마. 낯선 이들이 만나 환상과 환장 사이를 경험하는 패키지여행. 그렇게 한 무리의 프랑스 여행이 시작됩니다. 여행지에서 각자의 사연과 서로의 인연이 더해지는 시간들. 그리고 깨닫게 되죠. 들렀던 어느 곳보다도 서로를 더 잘 알게 됐음을.", "vn": "A group of strangers meet as part of a sightseeing tour in France, but end up learning more about one another than the tourist spots that they visit."}
title: The Package
overview: A group of strangers meet as part of a sightseeing tour in France, but end up learning more about one another than the tourist spots that they visit.

tagline: All that was mine.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Mine", "kr": "Mine", "vn": "Sở Hữu"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Encaged in a gold-clad life of secrets and lies, two women in a conglomerate family seek to topple all that stands in their way of finding true joy.", "kr": "세상의 편견에서 벗어나 진짜 나의 것을 찾아가는 강인한 여성들의 이야기", "vn": "Mắc kẹt trong cuộc sống dát vàng của bí mật và dối trá, hai người phụ nữ trong một gia đình tài phiệt tìm cách lật đổ mọi thứ cản đường họ để đi tìm niềm vui đích thực."}
title: Mine
overview: Encaged in a gold-clad life of secrets and lies, two women in a conglomerate family seek to topple all that stands in their way of finding true joy.

titleTranslations: {"en": "You are My Destiny", "kr": "너는 내 운명", "vn": "You are My Destiny"}
overviewTranslations:
{"en": "Jang Sae-byuk is a cheerful and grateful orphan who always tries her best. She dreams of one day becoming an interior designer, despite her lack of education and money. Because of an accident that happened before the story starts (about three years ago), she loses her sight and undergoes corneal transplant surgery. Different events unravel when she encounters the Kim family, who has lost a daughter in a horrible car crash, unbeknownst to everyone besides the father and older brother. The stories then intertwine when Sae-byuk meets the Kim's extended family and the son of a big interior design company, Lohas, in Korea.", "kr": "드디어…서른 여섯 살 노총각 인생에 사랑이 찾아왔습니다.

사랑하는 사람이 나타나기를 꼬박 손꼽아 기다리기 서른 여섯 해. 천사 같은 그녀가 스쿠터를 타고 제 곁을 스쳐 지나갔습니다. 사람들은 그녀가 서울에서 갓 내려 온 다방 아가씨라고 합니다. 차 배달도 나가고 다른 남자들과 술도 마신다고 했습니다. 그러나, 저는 틈만 나면 그녀를 보러 다방으로 달려갔습니다. 장미꽃과 갓 짠 우유를 그녀에게 선물했습니다. 그녀와 함께 있고 싶은 마음에 난생 처음 티켓을 끊기도 했습니다.

그러나, 그녀는 사랑 따위는 필요 없다 합니다. 

그녀는 절 쉽게 받아주지 않았습니다. 사랑 따윈 필요 없다며. 그러던 어느 날, 저는 우연히 그녀의 눈물을 보게 되었습니다. 그녀도 사실은 사랑 받으며 행복하게 살고 싶어한다는 걸 알게 되었습니다. 그녀의 그 눈물을 씻어줄 수 있는 사람이 나였으면 좋겠다고 생각했습니다. 그래서 그 날, 저는 용감하게 마음을 고백했습니다. 세상에서 제일 행복하게 해주겠다고. 그리고 마침내, 그녀는 내 진심을 받아주었습니다. 

그녀와 함께 있으면 세상 모든 걸 가진 것 같았습니다. 그런데…

행복한 순간이 영원할 줄 믿었던 것도 잠시, 그녀에게 잊지 못할 과거가 찾아왔습니다. 혼자 힘들어 하는 그녀를 위해 전 재산인 젖소 목장이와 통장 5개를 처분했습니다. 이제, 우리 사랑에 더 이상의 장애는 없을 거라 믿었습니다. 그런데, 어느 날 그녀가 편지 한 통만 남긴 채 제 곁을 떠났습니다. 행복하게 살라고. 미안하다고. 며칠 후, 저는 그녀가 에이즈에 감염되었다는 청천벼락 같은 이야기를 듣게 되었습니다. 그녀가 아플 까봐 너무나 걱정이 됩니다. 내가 곁에 있어주어야 하는데. 

모두 그녀를 포기하라 합니다. 하지만, 저는 그녀를 끝까지 지킬 겁니다.

가족도, 친구도, 세상도 모두 그녀를 찾지 말라고 합니다. 하지만 저는 그녀 없으면 한시도 살 수 없습니다. 죽을 때까지, 아니 죽어서도 그녀를 지켜야 합니다. 

왜냐하면.. 그녀는 제 운명이기 때문입니다.", "vn": "Jang Sae-byuk is a cheerful and grateful orphan who always tries her best. She dreams of one day becoming an interior designer, despite her lack of education and money. Because of an accident that happened before the story starts (about three years ago), she loses her sight and undergoes corneal transplant surgery. Different events unravel when she encounters the Kim family, who has lost a daughter in a horrible car crash, unbeknownst to everyone besides the father and older brother. The stories then intertwine when Sae-byuk meets the Kim's extended family and the son of a big interior design company, Lohas, in Korea."}
title: You are My Destiny
overview: Jang Sae-byuk is a cheerful and grateful orphan who always tries her best. She dreams of one day becoming an interior designer, despite her lack of education and money. Because of an accident that happened before the story starts (about three years ago), she loses her sight and undergoes corneal transplant surgery. Different events unravel when she encounters the Kim family, who has lost a daughter in a horrible car crash, unbeknownst to everyone besides the father and older brother. The stories then intertwine when Sae-byuk meets the Kim's extended family and the son of a big interior design company, Lohas, in Korea.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Kara: Secret Love", "kr": "Kara: Secret Love", "vn": "Kara: Secret Love"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "\"Secret Love\" is written as an Omnibus Mini-Series consisting of 5 episodes, focusing on the ups-and-downs of love relationships such as a first love, breakups, secret crushes, etc. Each episode features a member of the girl group KARA, teamed up with a leading man. \"Secret Love\" will be produced in advance, then be aired in Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Taiwan and other Asian countries. ", "kr": "아련한 첫사랑의 향수부터 사랑과 이별에 대한 그녀들의 연애방식, 비밀스러운 짝사랑, 불멸의 사랑 등 아름답고 다채로운 사랑 이야기를 영화적으로 구성한 옴니버스식 로맨틱 드라마", "vn": "\"Secret Love\" is written as an Omnibus Mini-Series consisting of 5 episodes, focusing on the ups-and-downs of love relationships such as a first love, breakups, secret crushes, etc. Each episode features a member of the girl group KARA, teamed up with a leading man. \"Secret Love\" will be produced in advance, then be aired in Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Taiwan and other Asian countries. "}
title: Kara: Secret Love
overview: "Secret Love" is written as an Omnibus Mini-Series consisting of 5 episodes, focusing on the ups-and-downs of love relationships such as a first love, breakups, secret crushes, etc. Each episode features a member of the girl group KARA, teamed up with a leading man. "Secret Love" will be produced in advance, then be aired in Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Taiwan and other Asian countries.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Ms. Temper & Nam Jung Gi", "kr": "욱씨남정기", "vn": "Quý Cô Nóng Tính"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Ok Da-Jung is the youngest team leader in the cosmetics industry. She has divorced three times so far. She doesn't care what others think about her and she also has quite a temper. Nam Jung-Gi works as a section chief at the same cosmetics company as Ok Da-Jung. Unlike her, Nam Jung-Gi has a timid and nice personality. He can't say anything that makes others uncomfortable. He is able to make Ok Da-Jung's blood boil.", "kr": "갑질의 시대를 살아가는 을들의 고군분투기를 그린 드라마. 소심 끝판왕 정기(윤상현)는 대기업과의 납품계약에서 잇따른 실수로 성질 더럽고 깐깐하기로 유명한 욱다정 팀장(이요원)의 눈 밖에 나, 계약을 망친다. 퇴사 위기에 놓인 정기는 사태 수습을 위해 다정이 머물고 있는 호텔로 찾아가는데…", "vn": "Nàng Nóng Chàng Nhát - Ms Temper Nam Jung phim thuộc thể loại tình cảm do Hàn Quốc sản xuất xoay quanh câu chuyện nói về cô nàng Ok Da Jung là một lãnh đạo trẻ về ngành công nghiệp mĩ phẩm, nhưng về tình duyên thì không được may mắn, tính đến nay cô đã ly hôn đến ba lần vì rất nóng tính và điều quan trọng là Ok Da Jung không quan tâm đến những gì người khác nghĩ và nói, trong khi đó Nam Jung Gi là sếp của một phận cùng chung một công ty với Ok Da Jung, trái ngược với cô anh là một người rụt rè nhưng rất dễ chịu chính vì như thế Nam Jung Gi luôn làm cho Ok Da Jung phải sôi máu."}
title: Ms. Temper & Nam Jung Gi
overview: Ok Da-Jung is the youngest team leader in the cosmetics industry. She has divorced three times so far. She doesn't care what others think about her and she also has quite a temper. Nam Jung-Gi works as a section chief at the same cosmetics company as Ok Da-Jung. Unlike her, Nam Jung-Gi has a timid and nice personality. He can't say anything that makes others uncomfortable. He is able to make Ok Da-Jung's blood boil.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Great Show", "kr": "The Great Show", "vn": "The Great Show"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Wie Dae-Han  is an ex-lawmaker and is a materialistic kind of politician. He wants to get elected as lawmaker again. One day, 18-year-old girl Da-Jung comes to him. She tells him that he is her real father. Her mother raised four children, including Da-Jung, alone, but she died in a hit-and-run accident. Da-Jung is the only one now taking care of her 3 younger siblings. Wie Dae-Han accepts Da-Jung and her 3 younger siblings. He carries out “The Great Show” to become a lawmaker again.", "kr": "초선의원이었던 대한은 총선을 일주일 앞두고 패륜아 사건으로 재선에 실패한다. 잘나가는 국회의원에서 하루아침에 백수신세로 전락한 대한. 대리기사를 하며 근근이 살아가면서도 정계복귀의 꿈을 놓지 않는데... 시장에서 우연히 대학시절 썸타던 수현과 마주치게 된다. 반가워하는 대한과 달리 왠지 모르게 못마땅해 보이는 수현인데... 그들 앞에 의문의 여고생이 나타나 다짜고짜 잃어버린 동생을 찾아달라며 엉엉 운다. 이미지 쇄신이 필요한 대한 여고생을 도와줘 패륜아 꼬리표를 뗄 생각을 하는데...", "vn": "Wie Dae-Han  is an ex-lawmaker and is a materialistic kind of politician. He wants to get elected as lawmaker again. One day, 18-year-old girl Da-Jung comes to him. She tells him that he is her real father. Her mother raised four children, including Da-Jung, alone, but she died in a hit-and-run accident. Da-Jung is the only one now taking care of her 3 younger siblings. Wie Dae-Han accepts Da-Jung and her 3 younger siblings. He carries out “The Great Show” to become a lawmaker again."}
title: The Great Show
overview: Wie Dae-Han  is an ex-lawmaker and is a materialistic kind of politician. He wants to get elected as lawmaker again. One day, 18-year-old girl Da-Jung comes to him. She tells him that he is her real father. Her mother raised four children, including Da-Jung, alone, but she died in a hit-and-run accident. Da-Jung is the only one now taking care of her 3 younger siblings. Wie Dae-Han accepts Da-Jung and her 3 younger siblings. He carries out “The Great Show” to become a lawmaker again.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Scale of Providence", "kr": "신의 저울", "vn": "The Scale of Providence"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Jang Joon Ha is a man out for vengeance. In one day, Joon Ha lost the two most important people in his life. His brother, Young Ha, was wrongly convicted of a crime that he did not commit. The woman that he loved was murdered and his brother was the prime suspect. Joon Ha, an attorney, sets out to prove that someone else committed the crime.", "kr": "사법시험 합격 전 살인 사건에 연루된 가난한 고학생 주인공이 사법연수원에서 우정을 쌓은 친구와 갈등을 겪으면서 벌어지는 일을 그린 드라마", "vn": "Jang Joon Ha is a man out for vengeance. In one day, Joon Ha lost the two most important people in his life. His brother, Young Ha, was wrongly convicted of a crime that he did not commit. The woman that he loved was murdered and his brother was the prime suspect. Joon Ha, an attorney, sets out to prove that someone else committed the crime."}
title: The Scale of Providence
overview: Jang Joon Ha is a man out for vengeance. In one day, Joon Ha lost the two most important people in his life. His brother, Young Ha, was wrongly convicted of a crime that he did not commit. The woman that he loved was murdered and his brother was the prime suspect. Joon Ha, an attorney, sets out to prove that someone else committed the crime.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Golden Spoon", "kr": "금수저", "vn": "Thìa Vàng"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Would you trade your poor but loving family for a life of riches? When Seung Cheon gets his hands on a magical spoon that allows him to switch lives with his rich best friend, he thinks it’s a no-brainer. But life-altering decisions are always accompanied by a sense of doubt, and with only three chances to change his mind, Seung Cheon has to decide which of his two possible futures is worth keeping.", "kr": "가난한 집에서 태어난 아이가 우연히 얻게 된 금수저를 통해 부잣집에서 태어난 친구와 운명을 바꿔 후천적 금수저가 된 인생 어드벤처 이야기. 동명 웹툰 원작.", "vn": "Thìa Vàng được chuyển thể từ tiểu thuyết cùng tên, nội dung phim kể về câu chuyện của một đứa trẻ sinh ra từ một gia đình nghèo. Một ngày nọ cậu đã có được một chiếc thìa vàng và cậu đã sử dụng chiếc thìa vàng bí ẩn đó để hoán đổi số phận với một người bạn sinh ra từ gia đình giàu có."}
title: The Golden Spoon
overview: Would you trade your poor but loving family for a life of riches? When Seung Cheon gets his hands on a magical spoon that allows him to switch lives with his rich best friend, he thinks it’s a no-brainer. But life-altering decisions are always accompanied by a sense of doubt, and with only three chances to change his mind, Seung Cheon has to decide which of his two possible futures is worth keeping.

titleTranslations: {"en": "MIGNON", "kr": "MIGNON", "vn": "MIGNON"}
overviewTranslations:
{"en": "A boxer named Mignon, and a vampire doctor Young-on Oh, who find solace in the presence of one another through an aggressive and romantic affair.", "kr": "어려서 부모님을 잃고 낮에는 자동차 정비사로,

밤에는 불법투기장에서 이종격투기 선수로 살아가는 민용.

착취와 폭력으로 얼룩진 하루하루를 사는 그에게

관심과 손길을 주는 사람은 불법투기장의 의사 오영원이 유일하다.

“시키는 대로 다 할게요…! 제가…! 제가 도와줄 수 있어요!”

자신의 정체를 알고도 순수하고도 맹목적인 민용의 애정에

영원 역시 서서히 마음을 열게 되지만

민용을 옭아맨 지옥 같은 현실은 영원의 일상마저 뒤흔들게 되는데…!", "vn": "A boxer named Mignon, and a vampire doctor Young-on Oh, who find solace in the presence of one another through an aggressive and romantic affair."}
title: MIGNON
overview: A boxer named Mignon, and a vampire doctor Young-on Oh, who find solace in the presence of one another through an aggressive and romantic affair.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Salamander Guru and The Shadows", "kr": "도롱뇽도사와 그림자 조작단", "vn": "Salamander Guru and The Shadows"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Salamander Guru and The Shadows is a 2012 South Korean sitcom starring Choi Minho, Oh Dal-soo, Im Won-hee, Lee Byung-joon and Ryu Hyun-kyung. It aired on SBS from January 27 to March 30, 2012 on Fridays at 23:00 for 10 episodes. It is SBS's first sitcom in 5 years.", "kr": "Salamander Guru and The Shadows is a 2012 South Korean sitcom starring Choi Minho, Oh Dal-soo, Im Won-hee, Lee Byung-joon and Ryu Hyun-kyung. It aired on SBS from January 27 to March 30, 2012 on Fridays at 23:00 for 10 episodes. It is SBS's first sitcom in 5 years.", "vn": "Salamander Guru and The Shadows is a 2012 South Korean sitcom starring Choi Minho, Oh Dal-soo, Im Won-hee, Lee Byung-joon and Ryu Hyun-kyung. It aired on SBS from January 27 to March 30, 2012 on Fridays at 23:00 for 10 episodes. It is SBS's first sitcom in 5 years."}
title: Salamander Guru and The Shadows
overview: Salamander Guru and The Shadows is a 2012 South Korean sitcom starring Choi Minho, Oh Dal-soo, Im Won-hee, Lee Byung-joon and Ryu Hyun-kyung. It aired on SBS from January 27 to March 30, 2012 on Fridays at 23:00 for 10 episodes. It is SBS's first sitcom in 5 years.

tagline: What goes on in that mind of yours?
titleTranslations: {"en": "Doona!", "kr": "Doona!", "vn": "Doona!"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A college student navigates life and school while dealing with a unique predicament — he's living with a beautiful former K-pop sensation.", "kr": "새로운 삶과 학교생활에 적응하려 애쓰는 대학생 원준. 조금 특이한 사정이 있는데, 바로 화려한 K-pop 아이돌 시절을 뒤로하고 돌연 은퇴한 미모의 하우스 메이트와 산다는 것.", "vn": "Một sinh viên đại học xoay xở với cuộc sống và trường học trong khi ứng phó với tình cảnh dở khóc dở cười có một không hai: sống cùng một cựu thần tượng K-pop xinh đẹp."}
title: Doona!
overview: A college student navigates life and school while dealing with a unique predicament — he's living with a beautiful former K-pop sensation.

tagline: Were you swayed by me or was I swayed by you?
titleTranslations: {"en": "The Red Sleeve", "kr": "옷소매 붉은 끝동", "vn": "Cổ Tay Áo Màu Đỏ"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Based on a novel of the same name, it tells the record of a royal court romance between the King of Joseon who believes his duty is to his country first above love, and a court lady who wants to protect the life she has chosen.", "kr": "자신이 선택한 삶을 지키고자 한 궁녀와 사랑보다 나라가 우선이었던 제왕의 애절한 궁중 로맨스 기록", "vn": "Lee San lạnh lùng kiêu ngạo, sinh ra là hậu duệ thừa kế ngai vàng, là cháu trai cả của nhà vua. Số phận run rủi để chàng gặp được cung nữ Sung Deok Im và rơi vào lưới tình không lối thoát. Thế nhưng mang trong mình trọng trách trở thành vua của Joseon buộc Lee San phải lựa chọn giữa quốc gia và người phụ nữ mình yêu say đắm."}
title: The Red Sleeve
overview: Based on a novel of the same name, it tells the record of a royal court romance between the King of Joseon who believes his duty is to his country first above love, and a court lady who wants to protect the life she has chosen.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Love Story", "kr": "러브스토리", "vn": "Love Story"}
overviewTranslations:
{"en": "The drama describes 8 different love stories.  Story 1 (Ep. 1-2) : Sunflower - love story about a stalker.

Story 2 (Ep. 3-4): Message - love story by a mobile phone and other communication facilities.

Story 3 (Ep. 5-6): Lost Bagage - Sad memory makes her lose her future love.

Story 4 (Ep. 7-8): Open Ended - A woman who is dying from an illness meets a young guy.

Story 5 (Ep. 9-10): Rose - love story between a detective and a criminal.

Story 6 (Ep. 11-12): Miss Hip-hop and Mr. Rock - A man and a woman who are mentally different fall in love.

Story 7 (Ep. 13-14): Insomnia, Manual and Orange Juice - A woman who acts manually falls in love with a comic book creator.

Story 8 (Ep. 15-16): Host of Memory - A woman who receives donated a heart instantly flashes a man's face.", "kr": ""사랑"이라는 주제를 가지고 다양하게 살아가는 사람들의 삶을 조명한 TV영화 <러브스토리>  기존의 연속극 스타일을 깨고 영화적 상황을 통한 사랑 이야기로 사랑의 꿈과 환상을 주어  보는 이의 마음을 순화하고 살아볼 만한 세상에 대한 따뜻함을 보여준다. 8편의 색다른  사랑이야기에는 매회마다 최고의 연기자들이 출연하여 팽팽한 연기대결을 펼치며, 숨은  그림처럼 등장하는 카메오를 만날 수 있어 재미를 더해준다. <모래시계>, <여명의 눈동자>,  <카이스트> 등을 집필하여 드라마의 묘미를 각인시킨 송지나와 <머나먼 쏭바강>, <모델>을  연출한 이강훈 PD가 만나 전혀 새로운 형식의 드라마를 선보인다.", "vn": "The drama describes 8 different love stories.  Story 1 (Ep. 1-2) : Sunflower - love story about a stalker.

Story 2 (Ep. 3-4): Message - love story by a mobile phone and other communication facilities.

Story 3 (Ep. 5-6): Lost Bagage - Sad memory makes her lose her future love.

Story 4 (Ep. 7-8): Open Ended - A woman who is dying from an illness meets a young guy.

Story 5 (Ep. 9-10): Rose - love story between a detective and a criminal.

Story 6 (Ep. 11-12): Miss Hip-hop and Mr. Rock - A man and a woman who are mentally different fall in love.

Story 7 (Ep. 13-14): Insomnia, Manual and Orange Juice - A woman who acts manually falls in love with a comic book creator.

Story 8 (Ep. 15-16): Host of Memory - A woman who receives donated a heart instantly flashes a man's face."}
title: Love Story
overview:
The drama describes 8 different love stories.  Story 1 (Ep. 1-2) : Sunflower - love story about a stalker.

Story 2 (Ep. 3-4): Message - love story by a mobile phone and other communication facilities.

Story 3 (Ep. 5-6): Lost Bagage - Sad memory makes her lose her future love.

Story 4 (Ep. 7-8): Open Ended - A woman who is dying from an illness meets a young guy.

Story 5 (Ep. 9-10): Rose - love story between a detective and a criminal.

Story 6 (Ep. 11-12): Miss Hip-hop and Mr. Rock - A man and a woman who are mentally different fall in love.

Story 7 (Ep. 13-14): Insomnia, Manual and Orange Juice - A woman who acts manually falls in love with a comic book creator.

Story 8 (Ep. 15-16): Host of Memory - A woman who receives donated a heart instantly flashes a man's face.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Trolley", "kr": "트롤리", "vn": "Trolley"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A sudden tragedy brings the wife of an assemblyman out of her private life and forces her to confront family secrets and her own troubling past.", "kr": "과거를 숨긴 채 조용히 살던 국회의원 아내. 그녀의 비밀이 세상에 밝혀지며 부부가 마주하게 되는 딜레마와 선택에 대한 이야기를 그린 미스터리 딜레마 멜로 드라마", "vn": "Một bi kịch bất ngờ kéo vợ của một nghị sĩ ra khỏi cuộc sống riêng và buộc cô phải đối diện với những bí mật của gia đình cũng như quá khứ rắc rối của chính mình."}
title: Trolley
overview: A sudden tragedy brings the wife of an assemblyman out of her private life and forces her to confront family secrets and her own troubling past.

tagline: Is this woman a psycho? It is psychometry!
titleTranslations: {"en": "Behind Your Touch", "kr": "힙하게", "vn": "Bàn Tay Ma Thuật"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A psychic vet and a detective join forces to crack small-town cases — but their skills are tested when they unravel a chilling serial killer mystery", "kr": "범죄 없는 청정 농촌 마을 무진에서 우연히 생긴 사이코메트리 능력으로 동물과 사람의 과거를 볼 수 있게 된 성실한 오지라퍼 수의사 '봉예분'과 서울 광수대 복귀를 위해 그녀의 능력이 절실히 필요한 욕망덩어리 엘리트 형사 '문장열'이 자잘한 생활밀착형 범죄를 공조수사하던 중, 연쇄살인사건에 휩쓸리며 벌어지는 코믹 수사 활극", "vn": "Một bác sĩ thú y có năng lực ngoại cảm và một thanh tra hợp sức phá các vụ án ở thị trấn nhỏ. Nhưng kỹ năng của họ bị thử thách khi lật mở bí ẩn rùng rợn về tên sát nhân hàng loạt."}
title: Behind Your Touch
overview: A psychic vet and a detective join forces to crack small-town cases — but their skills are tested when they unravel a chilling serial killer mystery

titleTranslations: {"en": "HeartBeat", "kr": "가슴이 뛴다", "vn": "Nhịp Đập Trái Tim"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A thrilling romance between a vampire who desires to experience heart-throbbing love, and a cold-blooded woman.", "kr": "100년 중 하루 차이로 인간이 되지 못한 반인뱀파이어 선우혈과 인간미라고는 찾아볼 수 없는 여자 주인해가 어쩌다 동거를 시작하며, 진정한 온기를 찾아가는 아찔한 목숨 담보 공생 로맨스", "vn": "Phim xoay quanh một câu chuyện tình yêu giữa Seon Woo Hyul, một nửa người và một nửa ma cà rồng, không thể trở thành con người do chênh lệch một ngày trong suốt hơn 100 năm, và Joo In Hae, một người phụ nữ không có phần người thường và tìm thấy sự ấm áp đích thực."}

overview: A thrilling romance between a vampire who desires to experience heart-throbbing love, and a cold-blooded woman.

title: Before and After: Plastic Surgery Clinic
overview: Han Geon Soo is the young clinic owner who tries to protect his clinic from being taken over by loan sharks. He tries his best to save the clinic when uncollected loans are passed on to him after his father’s sudden death. Choi Yong Woo is a talented doctor who joins the clinic to return his thanks to Geon Soo’s father. Yong Woo is someone that often gets into arguments with patients who want to undergo unnecessary plastic surgery. Yoon Ki Nam is the nurse who forms a love triangle between the two men. Yoon Seo Jin is the manager who obtained her perfect beauty through plastic surgery.

titleTranslations: {"en": "All About Eve", "kr": "이브의 모든 것", "vn": "All About Eve"}
title: All About Eve
overview: This drama is about two girls, Jin Sun Mi and Heo Young Mi. Sun Mi had a nice childhood and grew up with lots of love from her father. Young Mi's mother left her when she was young and her father was a drunk who recently died. She had a hard childhood but never gave up and made it into college.

tagline: A special task force made up of the finest police officers and firefighters
titleTranslations: {"en": "The First Responders", "kr": "The First Responders", "vn": "Những Người Ứng Cứu Đầu Tiên"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A police station and a fire station adjoining each other cooperate in combating crime and fire in the most brutal and tragic cases.", "kr": "범인 잡는 경찰과 화재 잡는 소방의 공동대응 현장일지. 한 번 물면 반드시 잡는 열혈 형사와 작은 상처도 놓치지 않으며 마음까지 어루만지는 구급대원, 화염 속으로 돌진하는 소방관이야기", "vn": "Một bộ phim miêu tả chân thực về những quân nhân tại một đồn cảnh sát và một trạm cứu hỏa làm việc cùng nhau để giải quyết các nhiệm vụ, cùng nhau cứu giúp nhân dân và ngăn chặn tai họa."}
title: The First Responders
overview: A police station and a fire station adjoining each other cooperate in combating crime and fire in the most brutal and tragic cases.

tagline: I, too, waited for you
titleTranslations: {"en": "Tale of the Nine Tailed", "kr": "구미호뎐", "vn": "Bạn Trai Tôi Là Hồ Ly"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A TV producer discovers a secret supernatural world as she becomes entangled with a former deity who's spent centuries searching for his lost lover.", "kr": "1999년, 여우고개에서 벌어진 기이한 교통사고로 부모를 잃은 9살 소녀, 지아. 21년 후, 30살이 된 지아는 세상의 숨겨진 미스터리를 찾아서 밝히는 탐사보도 프로그램 “도시 괴담을 찾아서”의 피디로 활약 중이다. 그런데 어느 날, 지아네에 수상한 ‘괴물’에 대한 제보가 들어오는데...", "vn": "Yi Yeon (Lee Dong Wook), cửu vĩ hồ từng cai trị dãy núi Baekdudaegan như vị thần giám hộ, nhưng hiện đang sống ở thành phố. Anh có nhiệm vụ giám sát và trừng phạt những yêu quái gây hại đến cuộc sống của loài người. Anh phải chống lại sự truy lùng ráo riết của nữ đạo diễn Nam Ji Ah (Jo Bo Ah thủ vai). Bên cạnh đó, Yi Rang (Kim Bum), anh trai cùng cha khác mẹ của Yi Yeon, mang một nửa dòng máu con người. Yi Rang là một hồ ly tinh nguy hiểm với những cảm xúc thay đổi thất thường, người sẽ mang đến xung đột cho câu chuyện."}
title: Tale of the Nine Tailed
overview: A TV producer discovers a secret supernatural world as she becomes entangled with a former deity who's spent centuries searching for his lost lover.

tagline: 70 billion won that appeared out of nowhere, to keep or to return.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Little Women", "kr": "작은 아씨들", "vn": "Những Cô Gái Nhỏ Bé"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Three sisters, who only have each other and never enough money, get entangled in a conspiracy involving the rich and powerful.", "kr": "가난하지만 우애 있게 자란 세 자매가 거대한 사건에 휩쓸려 대한민국에서 제일 부유하고 유력한 가문에 맞서게 되면서 '돈'이라는 인생의 숙제를 풀어가는 과정을 뜨겁고 짜릿하게 그려내는 드라마", "vn": "Ba chị em, những người chỉ có nhau và không bao giờ đủ tiền, vướng vào một âm mưu liên quan đến những người giàu có và quyền lực."}
title: Little Women
overview: Three sisters, who only have each other and never enough money, get entangled in a conspiracy involving the rich and powerful.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Manny", "kr": "매니", "vn": "Manny"}
overviewTranslations:
{"en": "Manny is a 2011 South Korean romantic comedy television series, starring Suh Ji-suk, Choi Jung-yoon, Byun Jung-soo and Jung Da-bin. It aired on tvN from April 13 to June 2, 2011 for 16 episodes.

Tall, with a perfect figure and his qualifications as an Ivy League graduate, Kim Yi Han is Seoul's top male nanny. He is employed by Seo Do Young as a live-in nanny to look after her two young children, Eun Bi and Jung Min.", "kr": "

훤칠한 키, 완벽한 몸매, 아이비리그 출신 뉴요커인 이 남자가 보모?!!!

얼떨결에 대한민국 1호 매니가 되어버린 까칠한 싱글남과 

혼자서 두 자녀를 키우는 어리버버리 싱글만의 좌충우돌 동거생활이 시작된다.

", "vn": "Manny is a 2011 South Korean romantic comedy television series, starring Suh Ji-suk, Choi Jung-yoon, Byun Jung-soo and Jung Da-bin. It aired on tvN from April 13 to June 2, 2011 for 16 episodes.

Tall, with a perfect figure and his qualifications as an Ivy League graduate, Kim Yi Han is Seoul's top male nanny. He is employed by Seo Do Young as a live-in nanny to look after her two young children, Eun Bi and Jung Min."}
title: Manny
overview:
Manny is a 2011 South Korean romantic comedy television series, starring Suh Ji-suk, Choi Jung-yoon, Byun Jung-soo and Jung Da-bin. It aired on tvN from April 13 to June 2, 2011 for 16 episodes.

Tall, with a perfect figure and his qualifications as an Ivy League graduate, Kim Yi Han is Seoul's top male nanny. He is employed by Seo Do Young as a live-in nanny to look after her two young children, Eun Bi and Jung Min.

titleTranslations: {"en": "So Not Worth It", "kr": "내일 지구가 망해버렸으면 좋겠어", "vn": "Ước Gì Ngày Mai Tận Thế"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "New friends, new loves and new experiences mix together inside a colorful college dormitory in Korea that's home to students from around the world.", "kr": "국적, 다 다르다. 성격, 제각각이다. 외국인 학생들이 모인 한국의 한 대학 국제 기숙사. 이곳에서 그들은 우정을 쌓고, 사랑에 들뜨고, 세상을 배운다. 대부분 엉망진창 뒤죽박죽이지만?", "vn": "Bạn mới, tình yêu mới và trải nghiệm mới đan xen trong một ký túc xá trường đại học đầy màu sắc ở Hàn Quốc – ngôi nhà của các sinh viên từ khắp nơi trên thế giới."}
title: So Not Worth It
overview: New friends, new loves and new experiences mix together inside a colorful college dormitory in Korea that's home to students from around the world.

This drama tells the story of their road to fame and delves into controversial issues in the entertainment industry."}

titleTranslations: {"en": "Her House", "kr": "Her House", "vn": "Her House"}
title: Her House

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Brave Yong Su Jeong", "kr": "The Brave Yong Su Jeong", "vn": "Yong Soo-jung Dũng Cảm"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "An ingenuous home-shopping host Yong Sujeong dreams of becoming a successful businesswoman who wins people before money. After losing her parents as a kid, she travels around the country with tinker Yong Jangwon and grows up as a strong woman full of courage. She may look fierce on the outside, but in fact, she is a softhearted, clumsy crybaby and a dork who cannot even make eye contact with her crush, Ju Ujin. Meanwhile, there is Yeo Uiju, a man who gets on her nerves by loafing around her. As a soldier, he is more logical rather than empathetic, but he passes out whenever he gets drunk. He loses his face after meeting Sujeong, who drinks like a fish, but he starts to fall for her. By a twist of fate, he realizes he is the second grandson of Masung Group, and his older brother is Sujeong's crush, Ujin.", "kr": "현대판 거상 임상옥을 꿈꾸는 거침없는 상여자 용수정과 그녀에게 운명을 맡긴 악바리 짠돌이 여의주가 함께하는 화끈하고 통쾌한 로맨스 복수극", "vn": "Cô nàng Su Jeong mạnh mẽ và anh chàng Eui Ju keo kiệt sẽ có những màn trả thù hài hước."}
title: The Brave Yong Su Jeong
overview: An ingenuous home-shopping host Yong Sujeong dreams of becoming a successful businesswoman who wins people before money. After losing her parents as a kid, she travels around the country with tinker Yong Jangwon and grows up as a strong woman full of courage. She may look fierce on the outside, but in fact, she is a softhearted, clumsy crybaby and a dork who cannot even make eye contact with her crush, Ju Ujin. Meanwhile, there is Yeo Uiju, a man who gets on her nerves by loafing around her. As a soldier, he is more logical rather than empathetic, but he passes out whenever he gets drunk. He loses his face after meeting Sujeong, who drinks like a fish, but he starts to fall for her. By a twist of fate, he realizes he is the second grandson of Masung Group, and his older brother is Sujeong's crush, Ujin.

tagline: The queen fights the storm for her children.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Under the Queen's Umbrella", "kr": "슈룹", "vn": "Dưới Bóng Trung Điện"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A spirited queen tries to rein in her rowdy sons in order to make one of them the next king of Joseon, while her competitors vie to snatch the throne.", "kr": "조선 로열 패밀리의 교육법에 대한 소재로 모든 궁중 엄마들의 멈출 수 없는 자식 사랑과 욕망에 대한 이야기", "vn": "Một trung điện mạnh mẽ cố rèn những đứa con gây rối vào khuôn phép để một trong số họ có thể trở thành vị vua tiếp theo của Joseon, trong khi các đối thủ ganh đua giành ngai vàng."}
title: Under the Queen's Umbrella
overview: A spirited queen tries to rein in her rowdy sons in order to make one of them the next king of Joseon, while her competitors vie to snatch the throne.
