tagline: My dearest whom I miss and love very much
titleTranslations: {"en": "My Dearest", "kr": "연인", "vn": "Người Yêu Dấu"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A love-story between a noblewoman and a mysterious man who shows up in her hometown set in the 1600s during the Qing invasion.", "kr": "병자호란의 병화 속으로 던져진 사랑. 만남과 이별을 반복하며 닿을 듯 닿지 못한 연인. 그들이 몹시 그리워하고 사랑했던 시절의 이야기", "vn": "Người Yêu Dấu - My Dearest diễn ra trong triều đại Joseon, kể về câu chuyện của Lee Jang Hyun - người đàn ông bí ẩn đột nhiên xuất hiện tại làng Neunggeun. Sau khi trải qua những biến cố lớn, Jang Hyun từng tuyên bố sẽ không kết hôn, thế nhưng, tại Neunggeun, anh lại bị thu hút mạnh mẽ bởi Yoo Gil Chae. Là con gái thứ 2 trong một gia đình quý tộc, Gil Chae nhận được sự giáo dục tốt, song cô luôn tự cho bản thân là trung tâm của thế giới và tin rằng tình yêu của tất cả đàn ông trên đời cũng là của mình. Những suy nghĩ của cô dần thay đổi và trưởng thành hơn trải qua sự khốc liệt của thời chiến cũng như tình yêu với Jang Hyun."}
title: My Dearest
overview: A love-story between a noblewoman and a mysterious man who shows up in her hometown set in the 1600s during the Qing invasion.

tagline: I want it, I need it, I'll take it.
titleTranslations: {"en": "The Impossible Heir", "kr": "The Impossible Heir", "vn": "Người Thừa Kế Bất Khả Thi"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "An ambitious boy grows up and joins an intense war of desires to become a star of his own.", "kr": "시궁창보다 못한 지옥에서 자라난 태오의 야심은 비범함을 넘어선 재능이다. 그 재능을 무기로 자신의 목표를 향해 나아가는 태오 앞에, 각기 다른 욕망을 가진 인하와 혜원이 나타나고, 세 사람은 운명처럼 하나가 된다, 그렇게 얽힌 세 사람의 위험한 질주. 그 끝은 과연, 해피엔딩? 아니면, 돌이킬 수 없는 파국?", "vn": "Khi người con không hợp pháp của chủ tịch tập đoàn Hàn Quốc hợp tác với người bạn thời thơ ấu đầy tham vọng, cặp đôi này sẽ không ngừng cố gắng để chiếm lấy vị trí hàng đầu trong xã hội.Sinh ra trong một gia đình đơn thân nghèo khó chỉ với ngoại hình đẹp và sự quyến rũ, Kang In Ha thèm khát thành công. Quyết tâm làm điều gì đó cho bản thân mình, bất kể giá nào, In Ha khám phá ra rằng cha mình là chủ tịch của tập đoàn Kang Oh Group thành công vang dội và anh ta bỏ lại cuộc sống nghèo khó.Bị lạc lối bởi gia đình mới của mình, In Ha hợp tác với người bạn thông minh về trí tuệ của mình, Han Tae Oh, lập kế hoạch từ khi còn nhỏ để tiếp quản công ty và chiếm lấy vị trí hàng đầu trong xã hội. Nhận ra thành công từ sớm, cặp đôi này dần dần bắt đầu leo lên cho đến khi một người phụ nữ cũng tham vọng với quá khứ gian truân tương tự đe dọa phá hủy kế hoạch của họ mãi mãi."}
title: The Impossible Heir
overview: An ambitious boy grows up and joins an intense war of desires to become a star of his own.

overviewTranslations: {"en": "Chun-Il is married to Ra-Yeon and they have a daughter Ik-Hee. Chun-Il works as a salaryman and tries to survive at his company. Ra-Yeon is worried about her husband's low salary and Ik-Hee going through adolescence.", "kr": "Chun-Il is married to Ra-Yeon and they have a daughter Ik-Hee. Chun-Il works as a salaryman and tries to survive at his company. Ra-Yeon is worried about her husband's low salary and Ik-Hee going through adolescence.", "vn": "Chun-Il is married to Ra-Yeon and they have a daughter Ik-Hee. Chun-Il works as a salaryman and tries to survive at his company. Ra-Yeon is worried about her husband's low salary and Ik-Hee going through adolescence."}
title: Super Family
overview: Chun-Il is married to Ra-Yeon and they have a daughter Ik-Hee. Chun-Il works as a salaryman and tries to survive at his company. Ra-Yeon is worried about her husband's low salary and Ik-Hee going through adolescence.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Tomorrow Boy", "kr": "Tomorrow Boy", "vn": "Tomorrow Boy"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "“Tomorrow Boy” tells the tale of a handsome, young patriarch who lives on for tomorrow even in the midst of adversity. A young patriarch, Ahn Tae Pyeong, who has lost both his parents and is in charge of taking care of his grandmother along with his four younger siblings. Despite his circumstances, Tae Pyeong has a strong conviction and is energetic, while he pursues his studies and earns money for his family.", "kr": "꽃미남 소년가장이 어려운 역경 속에서도 희망을 잃지 않고 가족을 위해 헌신하며 내일을 준비해 나가는 청춘 성장 로맨스", "vn": "“Tomorrow Boy” tells the tale of a handsome, young patriarch who lives on for tomorrow even in the midst of adversity. A young patriarch, Ahn Tae Pyeong, who has lost both his parents and is in charge of taking care of his grandmother along with his four younger siblings. Despite his circumstances, Tae Pyeong has a strong conviction and is energetic, while he pursues his studies and earns money for his family."}
title: Tomorrow Boy
overview: “Tomorrow Boy” tells the tale of a handsome, young patriarch who lives on for tomorrow even in the midst of adversity. A young patriarch, Ahn Tae Pyeong, who has lost both his parents and is in charge of taking care of his grandmother along with his four younger siblings. Despite his circumstances, Tae Pyeong has a strong conviction and is energetic, while he pursues his studies and earns money for his family.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Twenty Years Old", "kr": "Twenty Years Old", "vn": "Twenty Years Old"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Two twenty year olds, Kim Hye Rim and Lee Ki Kwang, who attended the same middle school, meet again coincidentally after many years as a college student and an idol group member. Lee Ki Kwang is a member of popular idol group falls in love with Kim Hye Rim, his old friend from same middle school who has never dated before, as the two try to keep their love a secret from the rest of the world.", "kr": "Two twenty year olds, Kim Hye Rim and Lee Ki Kwang, who attended the same middle school, meet again coincidentally after many years as a college student and an idol group member. Lee Ki Kwang is a member of popular idol group falls in love with Kim Hye Rim, his old friend from same middle school who has never dated before, as the two try to keep their love a secret from the rest of the world.", "vn": "Two twenty year olds, Kim Hye Rim and Lee Ki Kwang, who attended the same middle school, meet again coincidentally after many years as a college student and an idol group member. Lee Ki Kwang is a member of popular idol group falls in love with Kim Hye Rim, his old friend from same middle school who has never dated before, as the two try to keep their love a secret from the rest of the world."}
title: Twenty Years Old
overview: Two twenty year olds, Kim Hye Rim and Lee Ki Kwang, who attended the same middle school, meet again coincidentally after many years as a college student and an idol group member. Lee Ki Kwang is a member of popular idol group falls in love with Kim Hye Rim, his old friend from same middle school who has never dated before, as the two try to keep their love a secret from the rest of the world.

title: Magic School
overview: Na-Ra is a university student and he has never had a girlfriend in his life. He wants to become a public servant. Jay is a popular magician mired in deep sadness. Joon is an intern at a hospital. He is poor, but he a has warm heart. These people gather at a magic school led by Master Han. Master Han has a daughter, Yi-Seul, who wants to become a dancer and not a magician.

overviewTranslations: {"en": "The story of students attending a specialized high school and pursuing their own dreams rather than go off to college. It will delve into how these students learn about love, friendship, the things they like versus the things they’re good at, and growing up in an intense environment. Gong Ki Joon is a hardworking student who takes on work and school at the same time and achieves his dream job after learning about love and friendship. Jeong Young Joo is a transfer student with a hidden story and a past connection to Gong Ki Joon.", "kr": "열여덟살 전문계 학교 고등학생들의 적나라한 학교 생활과 청춘 고민, 또 어른들이 몰랐던 이들의 막막한 생존에 대한 이야기", "vn": "The story of students attending a specialized high school and pursuing their own dreams rather than go off to college. It will delve into how these students learn about love, friendship, the things they like versus the things they’re good at, and growing up in an intense environment. Gong Ki Joon is a hardworking student who takes on work and school at the same time and achieves his dream job after learning about love and friendship. Jeong Young Joo is a transfer student with a hidden story and a past connection to Gong Ki Joon."}
title: School 2021
overview: The story of students attending a specialized high school and pursuing their own dreams rather than go off to college. It will delve into how these students learn about love, friendship, the things they like versus the things they’re good at, and growing up in an intense environment. Gong Ki Joon is a hardworking student who takes on work and school at the same time and achieves his dream job after learning about love and friendship. Jeong Young Joo is a transfer student with a hidden story and a past connection to Gong Ki Joon.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Babysitter", "kr": "베이비시터", "vn": "Babysitter"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "An attractive babysitter, who graduated from a prestigious university, begins to work as a babysitter for 3 children from a wealthy couple. The attractive babysitter begins to change.", "kr": "유복한 집안의 세 아이를 돌보는 보모와 그 집의 남편과 아내에게서 벌어지는 일을 그린 미스터리 스릴러 드라마", "vn": "An attractive babysitter, who graduated from a prestigious university, begins to work as a babysitter for 3 children from a wealthy couple. The attractive babysitter begins to change."}
title: Babysitter
overview: An attractive babysitter, who graduated from a prestigious university, begins to work as a babysitter for 3 children from a wealthy couple. The attractive babysitter begins to change.

tagline: In 1990s Gangnam, they ran the streets.
titleTranslations: {"en": "The Worst of Evil", "kr": "최악의 악", "vn": "Tội Ác Kinh Hoàng - The Worst of Evil"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Set in the 1980s, a husband and wife, both detectives, infiltrate a massive criminal organization responsible for the illegal drug trade between Korea, China, and Japan.", "kr": "1995년, 한중일 삼국의 마약 조직을 일망타진하기 위한 공조수사가 시작된다. 강남의 새롭게 떠오르는 악 강남연합 내부에 깊이 잠입한 시골 형사 준모. 장차 벌어질 아내 의정과 강남연합 보스 기철 사이의 묘한 관계를 예견하지 못한 채로... 돌이킬 수 없이 엮어버린 이들의 운명은 최악의 상황으로 치닫는다. 한국을 배경으로 마약 거래 트라이앵글의 국제 범죄 조직을 일망타진하기 위해 경찰 박준모가 새로운 범죄 조직을 잠입 수사하는 과정을 그린 범죄 액션 드라마.", "vn": "Lấy bối cảnh những năm 1980, The Worst Evil theo chân các điều tra viên chìm của cảnh sát thâm nhập vào một tổ chức tội phạm lớn chịu trách nhiệm buôn bán ma túy bất hợp pháp giữa Hàn Quốc, Trung Quốc và Nhật Bản."}
title: The Worst of Evil
overview: Set in the 1980s, a husband and wife, both detectives, infiltrate a massive criminal organization responsible for the illegal drug trade between Korea, China, and Japan.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Elegant Empire", "kr": "우아한 제국", "vn": "The Elegant Empire"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A man and a woman take revenge desperately yet elegantly after being trampled on by enormous power.", "kr": "거대한 힘에 의해 짓밟힌 정의와 감춰진 진실, 잃어버린 인생을 되찾기 위한 두 남녀의 처절하고도 우아한 복수의 여정을 그린 작품", "vn": "A man and a woman take revenge desperately yet elegantly after being trampled on by enormous power."}
title: The Elegant Empire
overview: A man and a woman take revenge desperately yet elegantly after being trampled on by enormous power.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Bichunmoo", "kr": "Bichunmoo", "vn": "Bichunmoo"}
title: Bichunmoo
overview: This drama depicts the sacrifices four central characters make for love, vengeance and honor as each travels a road of chosen destiny.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Miss Complex", "kr": "미스 콤플렉스", "vn": "Miss Complex"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Athletic brand Andar and Why Not Media teamed up to produce this story of three quirky friends and their individual complexes that also showcases the latest of Andar's fashions.", "kr": "20대 여성들의 콤플렉스를 담다! 외모지상주의를 겪는 지윤, 사회생활이 어려운 민제, 그리고 그들을 위로하는 당당한 두리. 세 친구는 서로 합심하여 각자의 콤플렉스를 이겨 나간다.", "vn": "Athletic brand Andar and Why Not Media teamed up to produce this story of three quirky friends and their individual complexes that also showcases the latest of Andar's fashions."}
title: Miss Complex
overview: Athletic brand Andar and Why Not Media teamed up to produce this story of three quirky friends and their individual complexes that also showcases the latest of Andar's fashions.

tagline: One past. One chance to save you.
titleTranslations: {"en": "A Time Called You", "kr": "A Time Called You", "vn": "Thời Gian Gọi Tên Em"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A grieving woman magically travels through time to 1998, where she meets a man with an uncanny resemblance to her late love.", "kr": "상실의 아픔을 겪고 있는 여자가 마법처럼 시간을 거슬러 1998년으로 돌아간다. 그리고 그곳에서 죽은 연인과 묘하게 닮은 한 남자를 만난다. 1년 전 세상을 떠난 남자친구를 그리워하던 준희가 운명처럼 1998년으로 돌아가 남자친구와 똑같이 생긴 시헌을 만나며 벌어지는 이야기를 그린 타임슬립 로맨스.", "vn": "Một người phụ nữ đau buồn xuyên không về năm 1998 rồi gặp một chàng trai giống với người yêu quá cố của cô đến mức khó tin."}
title: A Time Called You
overview: A grieving woman magically travels through time to 1998, where she meets a man with an uncanny resemblance to her late love.

tagline: We found love in a silent world.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Tell Me That You Love Me", "kr": "사랑한다고 말해줘", "vn": "Hãy Nói Với Anh Rằng Em Yêu Anh"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Since he lost his hearing, Cha Jin-woo has gotten used to his solitary life. One day, an aspiring actress Jung Mo-eun, enters his quiet daily routine.", "kr": "어린 시절, 갑작스레 청력을 잃은 뒤, 고독한 삶에 익숙해진 화가 차진우. 그의 고요한 일상에 소리 없이 노크하는 배우 정모은. 손으로 말하고 마음으로 듣는 두 사람의 소통과 사랑을 그린, 힐링 클래식 멜로.", "vn": "Nó sẽ miêu tả câu chuyện về một người đàn ông khiếm thính thoải mái thể hiện cảm xúc qua hình ảnh thay vì lời nói và một người phụ nữ thể hiện những gì trong lòng mình qua giọng nói. Jung Woo Sung sẽ vào vai Cha Jin Woo, một người khiếm thính thể hiện cảm xúc của mình qua những bức ảnh. Shin Hyun Bin sẽ mang lại sự sống cho nhân vật có tên Jung Mo Eun. Cô ấy có lòng tự trọng cao và vô tư. Cô ấy là người dễ tính dù có nhiều định kiến ​​trên thế giới."}
title: Tell Me That You Love Me
overview: Since he lost his hearing, Cha Jin-woo has gotten used to his solitary life. One day, an aspiring actress Jung Mo-eun, enters his quiet daily routine.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Lee San, Wind in the Palace", "kr": "이산", "vn": "Lee San, Wind in the Palace"}
title: Lee San, Wind in the Palace
overview:
Yi San, also known as Wind of the Palace, is a 2007 South Korean historical drama, starring Lee Seo-jin, Han Ji-min, Park Eun-hye, and Lee Jong-soo. It aired on Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation from September 17, 2007 to June 16, 2008 on Mondays and Tuesdays at 21:55. The series was produced by Lee Byeong-Hoon, who also produced award-winning television series Dae Jang Geum.

It won "Top Excellence Acting Award" for Lee Seo Jin and "Best Actress" for Han Ji-min at MBC's Acting Awards.

tagline: It all collapsed in an instant.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Wonderful World", "kr": "원더풀 월드", "vn": "Thế Giới Tươi Đẹp"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A mother who unfairly lost her young son, takes revenge against the perpetrator who has been forgiven by the law and heals her wounds.", "kr": "아들을 죽인 살인범을 직접 처단한 은수현이 그날에 얽힌 미스터리한 비밀을 파헤쳐 가는 휴먼 미스터리 드라마", "vn": "Một bộ phim trả thù hồi hộp, trong đó nhân vật nữ chính, người bị mất đi đứa con trai nhỏ của mình một cách bất công, trả thù kẻ thủ ác đã được pháp luật tha thứ và chữa lành vết thương cho cô."}
title: Wonderful World
overview: A mother who unfairly lost her young son, takes revenge against the perpetrator who has been forgiven by the law and heals her wounds.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Emperor Wang Gun", "kr": "태조 왕건", "vn": "Emperor Wang Gun"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Taejo Wang Geon was a 200-episode Korean drama starring Choi Soo Jong in the title role. It became very successful, reaching very high ratings, around 60%.", "kr": "고려를 건국한 왕건의 이야기를 다룬 드라마", "vn": "Taejo Wang Geon was a 200-episode Korean drama starring Choi Soo Jong in the title role. It became very successful, reaching very high ratings, around 60%."}
title: Emperor Wang Gun
overview: Taejo Wang Geon was a 200-episode Korean drama starring Choi Soo Jong in the title role. It became very successful, reaching very high ratings, around 60%.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Remarriage & Desires", "kr": "블랙의 신부", "vn": "Tham Vọng Hôn Nhân - Remarriage & Desires"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Through an exclusive matchmaking agency, women strive to marry a desirable bachelor and into the highest echelon of society.", "kr": "결혼을 통해 최상류층에 진입하겠다는 야망을 품은 사람들. 이들이 상류층 재혼 전문 결혼정보회사의 도움으로 최고 등급과 결혼하기 위한 여정에 나선다.", "vn": "Thông qua một công ty mai mối độc quyền phục vụ giới siêu giàu, một phụ nữ âm mưu trả thù cô tình nhân mưu mô của chồng cũ."}
title: Remarriage & Desires
overview: Through an exclusive matchmaking agency, women strive to marry a desirable bachelor and into the highest echelon of society.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Link: Eat, Love, Kill", "kr": "링크: 먹고, 사랑하라, 죽이게", "vn": "Liên Kết: Ăn, Yêu, Chết"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Eun Gye-hoon, a famous chef, opens a restaurant in a town he lived when he was a little kid. In the past, he had a twin sister. But after a traumatic incident tat the hometown, the family lost her. He used to have a strong emotional link to his sister, able to synchronize with any kinds of feelings she was having. When Noh Da-hyun, a young woman in need of help, visits him one day, Gye-hoon starts to feel that strong link again.", "kr": "18년 만에 다시 시작된 링크, 한 남자가 낯선 여자의 온갖 감정을 느끼며 벌어지는 감정공유 판타지 로맨스", "vn": "Liên Kết: Ăn, Yêu, Chết là một bộ phim lãng mạn giả tưởng xoay quanh một chàng trai cảm nhận được cảm xúc của một cô gái xa lạ, điều vốn chỉ xảy ra qua sự liên kết mà anh có được với người em gái song sinh mất tích 18 năm trước."}
title: Link: Eat, Love, Kill
overview: Eun Gye-hoon, a famous chef, opens a restaurant in a town he lived when he was a little kid. In the past, he had a twin sister. But after a traumatic incident tat the hometown, the family lost her. He used to have a strong emotional link to his sister, able to synchronize with any kinds of feelings she was having. When Noh Da-hyun, a young woman in need of help, visits him one day, Gye-hoon starts to feel that strong link again.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Andante", "kr": "Andante", "vn": "Andante"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "High school student Lee Shi Kyung suddenly moves out to the countryside and transfers to a mysterious high school. Getting through unfamiliar experiences, he realizes the meaning of life and love.", "kr": "전형적인 도시 아이인 시경이 시골로 전학 가면서 낯설고 두려운 경험을 극복하며 가치 있는 삶과 진정한 사랑의 의미를 깨닫는 기적 같은 성장통을 담아낸 가슴 따뜻한 힐링 성장드라마", "vn": "High school student Lee Shi Kyung suddenly moves out to the countryside and transfers to a mysterious high school. Getting through unfamiliar experiences, he realizes the meaning of life and love."}
title: Andante
overview: High school student Lee Shi Kyung suddenly moves out to the countryside and transfers to a mysterious high school. Getting through unfamiliar experiences, he realizes the meaning of life and love.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Jeongnyeon: The Star is Born", "kr": "Jeongnyeon: The Star is Born", "vn": "Jeong Nyeon: Ngôi Sao Vụt Sáng"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "The 1950s were an era filled with desire and aspiration, despite the aftermath of the Korean War. Jeongnyeon, a girl with a gifted voice, embarks on a journey to become the best actor of gukgeuk, or Korean female classical opera, where she encounters competition, solidarity, and growth.", "kr": "1956년 목포, 가진 것도 배운 것도 없지만 소리 하나만큼은 타고난 천재 소녀 윤정년. 바지락 캐고 생선 팔며 살아가는 고된 삶에 정년은 그저 돈을 많이 버는 게 소원인데. 시장에서 여느 때처럼 손님을 끌기 위해 소리를 하다 서울에서 내려온 당대 최고의 국극 스타 문옥경을 만나게 된다. 옥경을 통해 난생처음 국극이란 걸 보게 된 정년은 눈앞에 펼쳐지는 상상도 못한 세계에 충격과 전율을 느낀다. 절대 소리를 못 하게 하는 엄마의 반대를 무릅쓰고 우여곡절 끝에 서울의 매란국극단에 들어가게 된 정년. 이제부터 목표는 단 하나. 문옥경의 뒤를 잇는 최고의 국극 배우가 되는 것! 소리라면 누구보다 자신 있던 정년이지만 엘리트 연구생 허영서의 출중한 실력에 긴장하게 되고. 뛰어난 재능으로 단숨에 영서에 대적할 다크호스로 떠오르던 찰나, 생각지 못했던 난관에 부딪히게 되는데. 최고의 국극 배우를 향한 경쟁과 연대, 그리고 찬란한 성장기", "vn": "Jeongnyeon: The Star Is Born lấy bối cảnh Hàn Quốc những năm 1950 sau chiến tranh. Phim xoáy sâu vào hành trình phát triển bản thân của Jeong Nyeon, một cô gái nông thôn làm nghề bán cá ở chợ với niềm đam mê ca hát mãnh liệt. Jeong Nyeon đã vượt qua mọi sự cấm cảm từ gia đình, khó khăn của thời đại và thách thức đến từ cuộc sống nơi đoàn kịch để trở thành diễn viên pansori (một loại hình âm nhạc diễn xướng truyền thống của Hàn Quốc) xuất sắc nhất Hàn Quốc."}
title: Jeongnyeon: The Star is Born
overview: The 1950s were an era filled with desire and aspiration, despite the aftermath of the Korean War. Jeongnyeon, a girl with a gifted voice, embarks on a journey to become the best actor of gukgeuk, or Korean female classical opera, where she encounters competition, solidarity, and growth.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Brain Works", "kr": "두뇌공조", "vn": "Cân Não"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Two ill-fated men become a comic duo to investigate criminal cases involving a rare brain disease together.", "kr": "서로 못 죽여 안달 난 두 남자가 희귀 뇌질환에 얽힌 범죄사건을 해결하는, 본격 뇌과학 코믹 수사극", "vn": "Shin Ha Ru làm việc như một nhà thần kinh học. Anh ấy xuất thân từ một gia đình đã làm bác sĩ trong 3 thế hệ và anh ấy giàu có nhờ tài sản được thừa kế. Shin Ha Ru là một người tự tin, hành động và nói theo niềm tin của mình, nhưng anh ta không thương xót những người mà anh ta coi là cặn bã. Geum Myung Se làm thám tử. Anh ta hành động và nói năng cáu kỉnh với mọi người, điều này khiến những người không quen biết anh ta cho rằng anh ta có thể là một cảnh sát tham nhũng. Trên thực tế, Geum Myung Se là một thám tử tốt bụng và chính trực. Anh cũng từng kết hôn với Kim Mo Ran. Cô ấy có ham muốn tình dục đặc biệt mạnh mẽ. Shin Ha Ru và Geum Myung Se cùng nhau giải quyết các vụ án hình sự với sự giúp đỡ của Điều tra viên thôi miên Seol So Jung."}
title: Brain Works
overview: Two ill-fated men become a comic duo to investigate criminal cases involving a rare brain disease together.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Mackerel Run", "kr": "Mackerel Run", "vn": "Mackerel Run"}
title: Mackerel Run
overview: Cha Gong-chan was able to enter the top private high school in the affluent Gangnam District, Myoung-mun High, because of his soccer skills. But when he quits the sport, he finds himself an outcast and starts cutting class. One day, a beautiful new girl transfers to the school, and when she walks into his class, Gong-chan falls for her instantly. He is finally enthusiastic about going to school, but the school administrator informs him that he will be expelled if he misses one more day. Gong-chan vows that he won't give up on either his school life or his love.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Chief Kim", "kr": "김과장", "vn": "Sếp Kim Đại Tài"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "An accountant who's deft at embezzling funds becomes an unintentional hero to his colleagues when he gets a new corporate job.", "kr": "돈에 대한 천부적인 촉을 가진 ‘삥땅 전문 경리과장’ 김성룡이 더 큰 한탕을 위해 TQ그룹에 필사적으로 입사하지만, 아이러니하게도 부정과 불합리와 싸우며, 무너져가는 회사를 살리는 오피스 코미디 드라마", "vn": "Trưởng phòng tài vụ của Tập đoàn TQ đột nhiên tự sát và rơi vào tình trạng hôn mê. Kim Sung Ryong vốn là người chuyên làm sổ sách trốn thuế cho những công ty của xã hội đen được tuyển vào thay thế. Từ đây những bí mật về Tập đoàn TQ và nguyên nhân vụ tự sát của trưởng phòng tài vụ cũ được hé lộ."}
title: Chief Kim
overview: An accountant who's deft at embezzling funds becomes an unintentional hero to his colleagues when he gets a new corporate job.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Golden Pouch", "kr": "황금주머니", "vn": "Siêu Đầu Bếp - Golden Pouch"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "When Han Suk-Hoon was little, he was adopted by a family in the United States. He returns to Korea as an adult and works as an excellent surgeon, but he falls into a bottomless pit. He succeeds as a dumpling master.", "kr": "천재 외과의사가 나락으로 떨어진 후 만두장인으로 성공하며 진정한 가족과 사랑을 찾아가는 이야기", "vn": "Một bác sỹ phẫu thuật thiên tài Jin Yi Han. Khi Kim Ji-Han còn nhỏ, anh đã được nhận nuôi bởi một gia đình tại Hoa Kỳ. Anh trở về Hàn Quốc như một người lớn và làm việc như một bác sĩ phẫu thuật tuyệt vời, một người đã bị đánh mất danh dự của bản thân… luôn làm mọi việc theo cách riêng của mình để có được một gia đình hạnh phúc, một tình yêu trọn vẹn. Sau này anh trở thành một bậc thầy về bánh."}
title: Golden Pouch
overview: When Han Suk-Hoon was little, he was adopted by a family in the United States. He returns to Korea as an adult and works as an excellent surgeon, but he falls into a bottomless pit. He succeeds as a dumpling master.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Smile Again", "kr": "웃어라 동해야", "vn": "Smile Again"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Raised in America by his mentally handicapped mother Anna, Dong Hae dreams of traveling to Korea to propose to the woman he loves.. After qualifying for a speed skating competition, he smuggles his mother to Korea with him, but his undying devotion to her soon begins causing him problems. Finally reconnecting with his lost love Saewa, Dong Hae finds his affections divided when things don’t work out as he planned in this award-winning daily drama.", "kr": "미국으로 입양된 한국인 미혼모 엄마와 그의 아들 동해가 한국으로 돌아와 친부를 찾는 과정에서 각각 또 다른 사랑과 가족을 만들어가는 이야기를 그린 드라마", "vn": "Raised in America by his mentally handicapped mother Anna, Dong Hae dreams of traveling to Korea to propose to the woman he loves.. After qualifying for a speed skating competition, he smuggles his mother to Korea with him, but his undying devotion to her soon begins causing him problems. Finally reconnecting with his lost love Saewa, Dong Hae finds his affections divided when things don’t work out as he planned in this award-winning daily drama."}
title: Smile Again
overview: Raised in America by his mentally handicapped mother Anna, Dong Hae dreams of traveling to Korea to propose to the woman he loves.. After qualifying for a speed skating competition, he smuggles his mother to Korea with him, but his undying devotion to her soon begins causing him problems. Finally reconnecting with his lost love Saewa, Dong Hae finds his affections divided when things don’t work out as he planned in this award-winning daily drama.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Jejoongwon", "kr": "제중원", "vn": "Jejoongwon"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Jejoongwon is the first modern hospital in Korea established in the Joseon era in 1885. Baek Do Yang is a nobleman who gives up his status to enter its ranks. Hwang Jung is a butcher's son who becomes a physician, while Seok Ran enters Jejoongwon as an interpreter but takes on medical training to become a doctor.", "kr": "백정의 아들인 주인공이 한국 최초의 근대식 병원인 제중원에서 양의를 배우며 성공해가는 스토리를 그린 드라마다. 드라마 '하얀거탑'의 극본을 맡아 유명한 이기원이 작가로 참여했다.", "vn": "Jejoongwon is the first modern hospital in Korea established in the Joseon era in 1885. Baek Do Yang is a nobleman who gives up his status to enter its ranks. Hwang Jung is a butcher's son who becomes a physician, while Seok Ran enters Jejoongwon as an interpreter but takes on medical training to become a doctor."}
title: Jejoongwon
overview: Jejoongwon is the first modern hospital in Korea established in the Joseon era in 1885. Baek Do Yang is a nobleman who gives up his status to enter its ranks. Hwang Jung is a butcher's son who becomes a physician, while Seok Ran enters Jejoongwon as an interpreter but takes on medical training to become a doctor.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Yeonnam-dong 539", "kr": "연남동 539", "vn": "Yeonnam-dong 539"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "This drama about a group of people from diverse backgrounds who live together in a share house in Yeonnam-dong.", "kr": "새로운 형태의 라이프 스타일인 비혼족들의 이야기와 이들을 혼자이게 만드는 사회에 대한 경고,\n\n그리고 소중한 우리 이웃의 의미를 함께  담을 시리즈형 에피소드 드라마", "vn": "This drama about a group of people from diverse backgrounds who live together in a share house in Yeonnam-dong."}
title: Yeonnam-dong 539
overview: This drama about a group of people from diverse backgrounds who live together in a share house in Yeonnam-dong.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Cheese in the Trap", "kr": "치즈인더트랩", "vn": "Bẫy Tình Yêu - Cheese In The Trap"}
title: Cheese in the Trap
overview: Hong Seol and Yoo Jung attend the same college, but they couldn't be more different. Hong Seol is a poor, unpopular student with no money, while Yoo Jung is rich, well-liked, extremely smart, and popular. Hong Seol just wants to get through her college career quietly, but finds herself getting caught up in whatever Yoo Jung drags her into. Can Hong Seol break away, or will she continue to be the only person who sees Yoo Jung's true self?

titleTranslations: {"en": "Magic", "kr": "Magic", "vn": "Magic"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Kang-jae grew up under a jobless, gangster father. When Kang-jae accidentally meets Lee Dae-hae and his son Sun-mo, he feels more attached to Dae-hae than to his own father. Through Dae-hae and Sun-mo, Kang-jae learns the basics of magic as well as what fatherly love really means. Sun-mo, on the other hand, has a love-hate relationship with his father, who only cares about magic and nothing else. Meanwhile, Sun-mo is heartbroken by Dan-young, who falls in love with Kang-jae. Before that Dan-young was living with Sun-mo, mistakenly thinking that he is her long-lost brother before she was adopted. Yun-jin, Dan-young’s stepsister, instantly falls in love with Kang-jae and Kang-jae decides to marry her, not for love but for the sake of fulfilling his own ambitions at the price of spurning Dan-young.", "kr": "신세대 마술사의 사랑과 야망, 배신과 파멸을 다룬 트렌디 드라마이다.", "vn": "Kang-jae grew up under a jobless, gangster father. When Kang-jae accidentally meets Lee Dae-hae and his son Sun-mo, he feels more attached to Dae-hae than to his own father. Through Dae-hae and Sun-mo, Kang-jae learns the basics of magic as well as what fatherly love really means. Sun-mo, on the other hand, has a love-hate relationship with his father, who only cares about magic and nothing else. Meanwhile, Sun-mo is heartbroken by Dan-young, who falls in love with Kang-jae. Before that Dan-young was living with Sun-mo, mistakenly thinking that he is her long-lost brother before she was adopted. Yun-jin, Dan-young’s stepsister, instantly falls in love with Kang-jae and Kang-jae decides to marry her, not for love but for the sake of fulfilling his own ambitions at the price of spurning Dan-young."}
title: Magic
overview: Kang-jae grew up under a jobless, gangster father. When Kang-jae accidentally meets Lee Dae-hae and his son Sun-mo, he feels more attached to Dae-hae than to his own father. Through Dae-hae and Sun-mo, Kang-jae learns the basics of magic as well as what fatherly love really means. Sun-mo, on the other hand, has a love-hate relationship with his father, who only cares about magic and nothing else. Meanwhile, Sun-mo is heartbroken by Dan-young, who falls in love with Kang-jae. Before that Dan-young was living with Sun-mo, mistakenly thinking that he is her long-lost brother before she was adopted. Yun-jin, Dan-young’s stepsister, instantly falls in love with Kang-jae and Kang-jae decides to marry her, not for love but for the sake of fulfilling his own ambitions at the price of spurning Dan-young.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Story of a Mermaid", "kr": "인어아가씨", "vn": "Story of a Mermaid"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "《인어 아가씨》는 MBC에서 2002년 6월 24일부터 2003년 6월 27일까지 246부작으로 방영되었던 드라마이다.", "kr": "이기적인 욕심 때문에 조강지처를 버리고 새로운 가정을 꾸린 아버지. 그런 아버지를 향한 복수를 인생의 목표로 삼고 자라난 전처 딸의 복수를 그린 드라마", "vn": "《인어 아가씨》는 MBC에서 2002년 6월 24일부터 2003년 6월 27일까지 246부작으로 방영되었던 드라마이다."}
title: Story of a Mermaid
overview: 《인어 아가씨》는 MBC에서 2002년 6월 24일부터 2003년 6월 27일까지 246부작으로 방영되었던 드라마이다.

titleTranslations: {"en": "School 2013", "kr": "School 2013", "vn": "School 2013"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Go Nam-soon, a young boy, constantly gets bullied by a group in his class. Later, one of his old rivals joins his school. Eventually, they are able to sort out their differences.", "kr": "학교를 중심으로 일어나는 다양한 문제들을 그린 청소년 드라마", "vn": "Go Nam-soon, a young boy, constantly gets bullied by a group in his class. Later, one of his old rivals joins his school. Eventually, they are able to sort out their differences."}
title: School 2013
overview: Go Nam-soon, a young boy, constantly gets bullied by a group in his class. Later, one of his old rivals joins his school. Eventually, they are able to sort out their differences.

titleTranslations: {"en": "I'm Sorry, I Love You", "kr": "미안하다, 사랑한다", "vn": "Xin lỗi, anh yêu em"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Cha Moo Hyuk is a man who was adopted by an Australian family but treated cruelly and then abandoned at a young age. By chance, he meets Song Eun Chae, a fashion coordinator dedicated to her employer, singer Choi Yune. Their meeting will have implications for the rest of Cha Moo Hyuk's life as a devastating turn of events leads him to delve into his past, and ultimately find happiness.", "kr": "가수 윤의 코디네이터 은채는 해외 촬영 중 우연히 무혁을 마주친다. 어릴 적 호주에 입양된 후 외로움에 괴로워하던 무혁은 자신을 버린 어머니에게 복수하기 위해 윤의 매니저가 되고 한국에서 은채와 재회한다.", "vn": "Cha Moo Hyuk is a man who was adopted by an Australian family but treated cruelly and then abandoned at a young age. By chance, he meets Song Eun Chae, a fashion coordinator dedicated to her employer, singer Choi Yune. Their meeting will have implications for the rest of Cha Moo Hyuk's life as a devastating turn of events leads him to delve into his past, and ultimately find happiness."}
title: I'm Sorry, I Love You
overview: Cha Moo Hyuk is a man who was adopted by an Australian family but treated cruelly and then abandoned at a young age. By chance, he meets Song Eun Chae, a fashion coordinator dedicated to her employer, singer Choi Yune. Their meeting will have implications for the rest of Cha Moo Hyuk's life as a devastating turn of events leads him to delve into his past, and ultimately find happiness.

tagline: “I will have it all. “You will disappear now.”
titleTranslations: {"en": "Love Song for Illusion", "kr": "환상연가", "vn": "Tình Ca Ảo Mộng"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "The heart-fluttering love story and the fierce obsession between a man with two conflicting personalities and a woman who loves him.", "kr": "상반된 두 인격을 가진 남자와 그 남자를 사랑한 여자, 풋풋한 사랑과 지독한 집착을 넘나드는 판타지 사극 로맨스", "vn": "Kể về câu chuyện tình yêu của Sajo Huyn (người có 2 tính cách trái ngược nhau) và Yeon Wol - một nữ sát thủ. Ban đầu nữ sát thủ muốn sát hại Sajo Huyn nhưng sau đã đem lòng yêu mến và có tỉnh cảm với chàng. Thái tử Sajo Huyn là một người đa tài, tri thức, đã sử dụng khả năng nghệ thuật của mình để mở một tiệm y phục trong thành nhưng lại che dấu danh tính thái tử của mình. Thái tử có một vết thương lòng khi còn nhỏ đã bị người cha áp bức. Nhân cách khác của Sajo Huyn, là một người vô cùng quyến rũ, có thể dễ dàng quyến rũ người khác tuy nhiên anh lại bị lời nguyền sẽ cảm thấy đau đớn khi chạm vào cơ thể người khác. Yeon Wol sống một cuộc đời với nhiều biến cố, từ một sát thủ rồi trở thành vợ lẽ. Yeon Wol là hậu duệ hoàng gia của triều đại Yeon đã sụp đổ và là con gái duy nhất của Yeon Poong Hak. Yeon Wol che giấu danh tính và trở thành sát thủ Gye Ra để trả thù cho gia đình cô."}
title: Love Song for Illusion
overview: The heart-fluttering love story and the fierce obsession between a man with two conflicting personalities and a woman who loves him.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Marry Him If You Dare", "kr": "Marry Him If You Dare", "vn": "Lấy Anh Em Dám Không"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Set in the world of television broadcasting, Na Mi-rae travels back in time to prevent her 32-year-old self from marrying news anchor Kim Shin, thus sending her past self down a different path and enabling her to pursue the things she really wanted in life.", "kr": "보다 나은 나 자신을 위해 미래의 내가 찾아와 조언을 해주고 다른 운명을 개척할 수 있도록 새로운 선택의 방향을 제시해주는 타임슬립 드라마", "vn": "Mi Rae, một phụ nữ bình thường, không nổi bật, không đặc biệt, 32 tuổi, lứa tuổi quá muộn để bắt đầu làm 1 cái gì đó và cũng quá sớm để từ bỏ. Tương lai trước mắt của cô quá mù mịt. Nhưng có 1 Mi Rae tương lai của đã đến và cho cô lời khuyên về cuộc sống và hôn nhân. Mi Rae tương lai cố gắng hết sức để giúp cô tìm được 1 nửa hoàn hảo cho mình để cuộc sống tương lai tốt đẹp hơn..."}
title: Marry Him If You Dare
overview: Set in the world of television broadcasting, Na Mi-rae travels back in time to prevent her 32-year-old self from marrying news anchor Kim Shin, thus sending her past self down a different path and enabling her to pursue the things she really wanted in life.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Red Swan", "kr": "Red Swan", "vn": "Thiên Nga Đỏ"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Oh Wan-soo, who married into the powerful Hwain Group, faces death threats. She crosses paths with Seo Do-yoon, a bodyguard investigating a friend's death that is tied to the Hwain Group. Together, they unravel Hwain Group's secrets tainted with desire.", "kr": "대한민국 최고 재벌그룹인 화인가 며느리 '오완수'가 화인가 내에서 살해 위협을 받고 있던 중, 화인가와 관련된 친구의 죽음을 조사하던 경호원 '서도윤'을 만나, 그와 함께 욕망에 휩싸인 화인가의 비밀을 파헤치기 시작한다.", "vn": "Oh Wan-soo, người kết hôn với Tập đoàn Hwin hùng mạnh, phải đối mặt với mối đe dọa tử vong. Cô tình cờ gặp Seo Do-yoon, một vệ sĩ đang điều tra cái chết của một người bạn có liên quan đến Tập đoàn Hwain. Cùng nhau, họ làm sáng tỏ những bí mật nhuốm màu ham muốn của Tập đoàn Hwain."}
title: Red Swan
overview: Oh Wan-soo, who married into the powerful Hwain Group, faces death threats. She crosses paths with Seo Do-yoon, a bodyguard investigating a friend's death that is tied to the Hwain Group. Together, they unravel Hwain Group's secrets tainted with desire.

titleTranslations: {"en": "White Nights", "kr": "불야성", "vn": "Tình Yêu Quyền Thế"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A coldhearted heiress, a man from her past and an ambitious new hire in her company all become entangled on a battleground for money and power.", "kr": "냉혹한 상속녀 이경, 그녀를 사랑한 건우, 이경이 되고 싶은 세진. 권력과 금력의 용광로 속으로 부나비처럼 뛰어드는 세 남녀의 이야기.", "vn": "Trong bộ phim chỉ toàn những con người đầy tham vọng, muốn giành lấy quyền lực và tiền bạc về cho mình này, Jin Goo sẽ hóa thân thành Park Gun Woo, con trai của giám đốc một tập đoàn khét tiếng, một người đàn ông thông minh với một cái đầu lạnh. Park Gun Woo yêu Seo Yi Kyung (Lee Yo Won), một người phụ nữ đầy mạnh mẽ ..."}
title: White Nights
overview: A coldhearted heiress, a man from her past and an ambitious new hire in her company all become entangled on a battleground for money and power.

titleTranslations: {"en": "얼마나 좋길래", "kr": "얼마나 좋길래", "vn": "얼마나 좋길래"}
title: 얼마나 좋길래

titleTranslations: {"en": "Poseidon", "kr": "포세이돈 ", "vn": "Cảnh Sát Biển - Poseidon"}
title: Poseidon
overview: This action packed thriller follows a covert Marines unit that once trailed Choi Hee Gon, maritime kingpin of a notorious crime syndicate. Team leader Kwon Jung Ryool was forced to abort his mission after Hee Gon slayed his wife and all the loved ones of the team’s original members. Stranded, Kim Sun Woo, Jung Ryool’s trusted young agent, has remained undercover. Years later, with Poseidon’s reputation and credibility wrecked, Jung Ryool summons Sun Woo from the underworld and together, they set out to take down Hee Gon once and for all. More than a pretty face, Lee Soo Yoon joins the new team as a corporal who is not to be tampered with.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Her Lovely Heels", "kr": "여자만화 구두", "vn": "Her Lovely Heels"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "The story about secret office love affair between Shin Ji Hoo, a 24 year-old woman who’s afraid of love and Oh Tae Soo, a 28 year-old man who has lots of dating experience and is rather cynical about love, but slowly transforms as he meets Ji Hoo.", "kr": "사랑을 두려워하는 스물넷 여자 신지후와 사랑을 믿지 못하는 스물여덟 남자 오태수의 사내 연애 이야기를 담은 웹툰을 원작으로 한 드라마", "vn": "The story about secret office love affair between Shin Ji Hoo, a 24 year-old woman who’s afraid of love and Oh Tae Soo, a 28 year-old man who has lots of dating experience and is rather cynical about love, but slowly transforms as he meets Ji Hoo."}
title: Her Lovely Heels
overview: The story about secret office love affair between Shin Ji Hoo, a 24 year-old woman who’s afraid of love and Oh Tae Soo, a 28 year-old man who has lots of dating experience and is rather cynical about love, but slowly transforms as he meets Ji Hoo.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Romance in the House", "kr": "가족X멜로", "vn": "Tình Yêu Trở Về Mái Ấm"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "After his business crashes, a man disappears from his family for 11 years. But when he makes a return as their wealthy landlord, a messy reunion ensues.", "kr": "11년 전에 내다 버린 아빠가 우리 집 건물주로 컴백하며 벌어지는 피 튀기는 패밀리 멜로", "vn": "Sau khi việc làm ăn sụp đổ, người đàn ông nọ biến mất khỏi gia đình trong 11 năm. Nhưng khi anh trở lại với tư cách người chủ nhà giàu có của họ, cuộc đoàn tụ đầy hỗn loạn xảy ra."}
title: Romance in the House
overview: After his business crashes, a man disappears from his family for 11 years. But when he makes a return as their wealthy landlord, a messy reunion ensues.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Life is Beautiful", "kr": "Life is Beautiful", "vn": "Life is Beautiful"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Chairman Yu is a tycoon who owns multiple hotel chains. He decides to hand his business down to his impulsive younger daughter, Hee-Jung, who studied hotel management in Switzerland. His older daughter, Su-Jung, is a concert pianist. Hee-Jung learns the business by starting at the bottom in the P.R. Department. She has a deep emotional scar from an incident where her first boyfriend was killed trying to save her life. To expand his business, Chairman Yu decides to build a resort town next to a casino in Sabuk, a deserted mine town in Kangwon Province. In the process, Chairman Yu's right-hand man is confronted by a local hoodlum (Jae-min) who wants to preserve his hometown the way it is. Jae-min's uncanny resemblance to Hee-Jung's dead boyfriend gets her involved in the business such that she has to go against her father in order to help Jae-min.", "kr": "Chairman Yu is a tycoon who owns multiple hotel chains. He decides to hand his business down to his impulsive younger daughter, Hee-Jung, who studied hotel management in Switzerland. His older daughter, Su-Jung, is a concert pianist. Hee-Jung learns the business by starting at the bottom in the P.R. Department. She has a deep emotional scar from an incident where her first boyfriend was killed trying to save her life. He decides to hand his business down to his impulsive younger daughter, Hee-Jung, who studied hotel management in Switzerland. His older daughter, Su-Jung, is a concert pianist. To expand his business, Chairman Yu decides to build a resort town next to a casino in Sabuk, a deserted mine town in Kangwon Province. Jae-min's uncanny resemblance to Hee-Jung's dead boyfriend gets her involved in the business such that she has to go against her father in order to help Jae-min."}
title: Life is Beautiful
overview: Chairman Yu is a tycoon who owns multiple hotel chains. He decides to hand his business down to his impulsive younger daughter, Hee-Jung, who studied hotel management in Switzerland. His older daughter, Su-Jung, is a concert pianist. Hee-Jung learns the business by starting at the bottom in the P.R. Department. She has a deep emotional scar from an incident where her first boyfriend was killed trying to save her life. To expand his business, Chairman Yu decides to build a resort town next to a casino in Sabuk, a deserted mine town in Kangwon Province. In the process, Chairman Yu's right-hand man is confronted by a local hoodlum (Jae-min) who wants to preserve his hometown the way it is. Jae-min's uncanny resemblance to Hee-Jung's dead boyfriend gets her involved in the business such that she has to go against her father in order to help Jae-min.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Woman of Matchless Beauty, Park Jung Kum", "kr": "Woman of Matchless Beauty, Park Jung Kum", "vn": "Woman of Matchless Beauty, Park Jung Kum"}
overviewTranslations:
{"en": "", "kr": "인생은 아픔이 있어도 앞으로 나아가야 하는 것이다!

미모의 멋진 여형사가 활약하는 어설픈 수사드라마가 아닌, 수다스럽고 억척스러우며 적당히 능글맞고 때로는 뻔뻔한, 아줌마형사의 애환과 활약상을 생활감 있게 그려내는 드라마를 통해, 여성 시청자들이 친근함과 통쾌감을 느낄 수 있도록 한다.

여자가 나이를 먹으면 주변에서는 좋은 아내, 현명한 어머니이기만 하면 다 됐다고 생각하겠지만, 그러나 그 어떤 아줌마도 여자이기 때문에 더 늙기 전에 단 한번만이라도, 좋은 여자로서가 아닌, 사랑스런 여자로서, 남자의 진정하고도 열렬한 사랑을 받아보고 싶다는 소망은 있다.

보잘 것 없지만 비굴하지 않은 아줌마 삼순이의 러브로망을 통해, 더 이상 그 어떤 남자에게도 여자로서 사랑 받지는 못할 것이라고 낙담한 아줌마들에게, 이 나이의 내게도… 하는 작은 설렘을 준다.

이혼이 결혼만큼 빈번한 세상.

부모의 이혼은 어쩔 수 없이 자식들에게 치명적인 상처가 된다. 자식이야기만 나오면 미안해서 뜨거운 눈물을 왈칵 쏟아내는 이혼한 부모들에게 자식은, 부모가 그 어떤 상황에서도 사랑을 포기하지 않으면 반드시 이 사회에서 밝고 행복하게 살 수 있다는 위로와 용기를 주고 싶어서 이 드라마를 만들고자 한다. 그 어떤 직업보다도 일과 가정생활을 병행하기 어려운, 형사라는 직업을 가진 주인공을 통해, 이 시대의 일하는 여성의 고충을 그린다.

주인공 박정금이, 자신의 이혼과정에서 불행해진 아들 때문에 눈물을 삼키면서, 비로소 부모의 마음을 이해하고, 자신의 모든 불행의 근원이라고 믿어왔던 아버지와 화해하게 되는 가족이야기를 통해, 주말드라마의 특성인 가족극의 끈끈한 감동을 준다.", "vn": ""}
title: Woman of Matchless Beauty, Park Jung Kum

tagline: 3 names, 3 lives, 3 murders.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Mask Girl", "kr": "마스크걸", "vn": "Cô Gái Mang Mặt Nạ"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "An office worker who is insecure about her looks becomes a masked internet personality by night — until a chain of ill-fated events overtakes her life.", "kr": "외모 콤플렉스를 가진 여자. 낮에는 평범한 직장인이지만, 밤이면 마스크로 얼굴을 가린 채 인터넷 방송 BJ로 변신한다. 그러던 중, 예기치 않은 불운한 사건이 연거푸 그녀의 삶을 엄습하는데...", "vn": "Một nhân viên văn phòng không tự tin về ngoại hình của mình trở thành nhân vật đeo mặt nạ trên mạng vào ban đêm cho đến khi một chuỗi sự kiện đen đủi ập đến với cuộc đời cô."}
title: Mask Girl
overview: An office worker who is insecure about her looks becomes a masked internet personality by night — until a chain of ill-fated events overtakes her life.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Devil Judge", "kr": "악마판사", "vn": "Thẩm Phán Ác Ma"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "The court system is corrupted and old-fashioned. People desire a new system that can satisfy the crowds. However, are the crowds always correct? The drama shows how judges discover the truth about people in court. It centers around a chief judge who doesn’t believe in justice, but only makes judgements that the crowds will be satisfied with. An assistant judge starts to question his motives and tries to find the truth.", "kr": "가상의 디스토피아 대한민국, 전 국민이 참여하는 라이브 법정 쇼와 함께 등장한 '악마판사' 강요한. 그는 모두가 원하는 영웅인가, 법관의 가면을 쓴 악마인가?", "vn": "Lấy bối cảnh ở một của Hàn Quốc ngày nay, nơi cuộc sống hàng ngày hỗn loạn và xã hội đã sụp đổ đến mức mọi người công khai bày tỏ sự ngờ vực và căm ghét đối với các nhà lãnh đạo của họ. Trong thế giới không có luật pháp và trật tự này, Thẩm phán trưởng Kang đang báo hiệu sự cần thiết phải thay đổi. Phòng xử án của anh ta là chủ đề của một chương trình thực tế, nơi anh ta trừng phạt kẻ có tội một cách không thương tiếc, khiến anh ta có biệt danh là 'Thẩm Phán Ác Ma '.  Là một nhân vật gây chia rẽ với hào quang bí ẩn luôn tin vào danh tính và tham vọng thực sự của anh ta, công chúng không chắc anh ta là anh hùng thực sự hay ai đó, cố ý gieo mầm bất mãn trong phòng xử án của anh ta."}
title: The Devil Judge
overview: The court system is corrupted and old-fashioned. People desire a new system that can satisfy the crowds. However, are the crowds always correct? The drama shows how judges discover the truth about people in court. It centers around a chief judge who doesn’t believe in justice, but only makes judgements that the crowds will be satisfied with. An assistant judge starts to question his motives and tries to find the truth.

tagline: The only star that shines to the shining star
titleTranslations: {"en": "Shooting Stars", "kr": "별똥별", "vn": "Sao Băng"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Frustrations and feelings collide when a dynamic PR executive finds herself working with her irksome nemesis — who happens to be a megastar client.", "kr": "하늘의 별과 같은 스타들의 뒤에서 그들을 빛나게 하기 위해 피, 땀, 눈물을 흘리는 사람들의 리얼한 현장 이야기를 그린 로맨틱 코미디", "vn": "Bộ phim lấy chủ đề về giới giải trí và các công ty quản lí, kể về câu chuyện các minh tinh như những ngôi sao không thể tự mình tỏa sáng trên bầu trời, chủ yếu là câu chuyện của những người làm việc ở hậu trường ngành giải trí, những con người làm việc chăm chỉ khổ cực sau những lùm xùm của các minh tinh. Là câu chuyện từ thù hận đến tình yêu lãn mạn giữa Oh Han Byul là trưởng nhóm PR tại một công ty giải trí, và ngôi sao nổi tiếng Gong Tae Sung. Một trưởng nhóm quan hệ công chúng tài giỏi có năng lực phản ứng tuyệt vời khi các scandal xảy ra, và một ngôi sao nổi tiếng trong làng giải trí, chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra giữa họ? Bộ phim có sự tham gia của các diễn viên Lee Sung Kyung và Kim Young Dae."}
title: Shooting Stars
overview: Frustrations and feelings collide when a dynamic PR executive finds herself working with her irksome nemesis — who happens to be a megastar client.

tagline: Do you believe in magic?
titleTranslations: {"en": "The Sound of Magic", "kr": "안나라수마나라", "vn": "Annarasumanara: Thanh Âm Của Phép Thuật"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "An enigmatic magician living in an abandoned amusement park introduces magic into the life of a high schooler struggling with harsh realities.", "kr": "버려진 유원지에 사는 마술사. 힘겨운 현실 속에서 너무 빨리 어른이 돼버린 고등학생에게 마법 같은 위로를 건넨다. 절망적인 현실이 사라지고 희망이 다시 샘솟는 특별한 마술이 시작된다.", "vn": "An enigmatic magician living in an abandoned amusement park introduces magic into the life of a high schooler struggling with harsh realities."}
title: The Sound of Magic
overview: An enigmatic magician living in an abandoned amusement park introduces magic into the life of a high schooler struggling with harsh realities.

They start off on the wrong foot and treats each other as if they were siblings, constantly fighting. Ho-Jung's friend Cha Hee has a thing for Kyu-In and Ho-Jung later realizes that she too has feelings for him. Ho-Jae, Ho-Jung's brother, is a player, who has good physical features. title: We Are Dating Now
overview: Ho-Jung is a cute, naive girl who often falls head over heals with the wrong guys. Both Ho-Jung and Kyu-In, her neighbor, are idealistic about love. They start off on the wrong foot and treats each other as if they were siblings, constantly fighting. Ho-Jung's friend Cha Hee has a thing for Kyu-In and Ho-Jung later realizes that she too has feelings for him. Ho-Jae, Ho-Jung's brother, is a player, who has good physical features. Things start to get complicated for Ho-Jae when he falls for Ho-Jung's friend Soo-Ji, who does not have a physical appeal but has a good personality and intelligence.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Partner", "kr": "Partner", "vn": "Partner"}
overviewTranslations:
{"en": ""Partner" centers around two law firms as they struggle to defend the accused and those around them. Kang Eun-ho, a widowed single mother & attorney, tangles with the charismatic and ruthless attorney Lee Tae-jo.

In the first two episodes the attorneys work on cases involving a step-brother chraged with murdering of his step-sister and a lawsuit between a wealthy mother-in-law and her divorced daughter-in-law.

title: Partner
overview:
"Partner" centers around two law firms as they struggle to defend the accused and those around them. Kang Eun-ho, a widowed single mother & attorney, tangles with the charismatic and ruthless attorney Lee Tae-jo.

In the first two episodes the attorneys work on cases involving a step-brother chraged with murdering of his step-sister and a lawsuit between a wealthy mother-in-law and her divorced daughter-in-law.

Each successive episode will cover provocative cases like these, while also bringing to light the charms of the attorneys and their daily lives.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Joseon Attorney: A Morality", "kr": "Joseon Attorney: A Morality", "vn": "Luật Sư Thời Joseon"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Set in the Joseon era, an exhilarating legal revenge of a lawyer who avenges the death of his parents by trial begins.", "kr": "계획된 송사들을 일으키고 억울한 피해자의 마음까지 이용하는 독종변호사 강한수가 뜻하지 않게 백성들의 해결사, 은인, 급기야 영웅으로 추앙받게 되면서 진짜 정의로운 변호사로 성장해나가는 통쾌하고 따뜻한 이야기.", "vn": "Kang Han Soo cố gắng trở thành luật sư để trả thù kẻ chịu trách nhiệm về cái chết của cha mẹ mình. Bề ngoài, Han Soo nhìn có vẻ nông cạn và ngu ngốc, nhưng chàng có những cảm nhận sâu sắc, cùng trí óc thông minh của một thiên tài. Trong quá trình tích lũy kinh nghiệm, Han Soo cuối cùng đã trở thành một luật sư có năng lực, giúp nước, cứu dân."}
title: Joseon Attorney: A Morality
overview: Set in the Joseon era, an exhilarating legal revenge of a lawyer who avenges the death of his parents by trial begins.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Criminal Minds", "kr": "크리미널 마인드", "vn": "Hành Vi Phạm Tội"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Based on the US TV series of the same name, profilers investigate cases from the perspective of the criminals to solve them.", "kr": "한국판 '크리미널 마인드'는 정신이상자, 소시오패스, 테러리스트 등 잔혹한 범죄자들을 대상으로 프로파일링 기법으로 수사하는 국가범죄정보국 행동분석팀(NCI) 요원들의 활약에 관한 드라마이다. 범죄자의 입장에서 사건을 돌아보고, 단순한 증거 수집보단 철저한 프로파일링을 통해 미확인범의 행동, 인지, 생각, 등을 가려내 그들의 움직임을 예측하는 프로파일러로서의 수사와 요원들의 일상을 심도 깊게 그려낸다. 한국 실정에 맞게 사건을 극화하고 인물들의 사연과 드라마를 보강해서 장르 드라마에 익숙한 국내 시청자들이 열광할 스릴, 드라마, 액션 등을 모두 느낄 수 있는 한국형 범죄 심리 수사극으로 재 탄생된다.", "vn": "Phim kể về một đội điều tra là các profiler (chyên gia phá án bằng tâm lý học), họ dựa trên các hồ sơ phạm tội để phá các vụ án qua góc nhìn tâm lý của tội phạm."}
title: Criminal Minds
overview: Based on the US TV series of the same name, profilers investigate cases from the perspective of the criminals to solve them.

tagline: ~ The epic story of people who bet their lives on drama ~
titleTranslations: {"en": "The King of Dramas", "kr": "드라마의 제왕", "vn": "The King of Dramas"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Sparks fly when career meets romance in this behind-the-scenes drama.", "kr": "드라마는 무조건 돈이 되어야 한다는 베테랑 외주 제작사 대표와 드라마는 '인간애'라고 주장하는 신인 작가, 타협을 모르는 국내 톱스타 배우가 만나 펼치는 드라마 제작기를 코미디 풍으로 그린 드라마.", "vn": "Sparks fly when career meets romance in this behind-the-scenes drama."}
title: The King of Dramas
overview: Sparks fly when career meets romance in this behind-the-scenes drama.

titleTranslations: {"en": "My Beloved Sister", "kr": "My Beloved Sister", "vn": "My Beloved Sister"}

{"en": "My Beloved Sister is a 2006 South Korean television series starring Song Yun-ah and Kim Sung-soo. It aired on MBC from August 12, 2006 to February 18, 2007 on Saturdays and Sundays at 19:55 for 55 episodes.

Song stars as the titular older sister who must carry the family when the world is pulled out from under her.", "kr": "My Beloved Sister is a 2006 South Korean television series starring Song Yun-ah and Kim Sung-soo. It aired on MBC from August 12, 2006 to February 18, 2007 on Saturdays and Sundays at 19:55 for 55 episodes.

It aired on MBC from August 12, 2006 to February 18, 2007 on Saturdays and Sundays at 19:55 for 55 episodes.

Song stars as the titular older sister who must carry the family when the world is pulled out from under her."}
title: My Beloved Sister
overview:
My Beloved Sister is a 2006 South Korean television series starring Song Yun-ah and Kim Sung-soo. It aired on MBC from August 12, 2006 to February 18, 2007 on Saturdays and Sundays at 19:55 for 55 episodes.

Song stars as the titular older sister who must carry the family when the world is pulled out from under her.

titleTranslations: {"en": "My Runway", "kr": "마이 런웨이", "vn": "Sàn Diễn Của Tôi"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "An egotistic top male model and a pretty model wannabe are forced to live each other's lives until they figure out a way to undo their body switch.", "kr": "자기밖에 모르는 남자 톱모델과 모델을 꿈꾸는 예쁜 소녀가 몸을 다시 뒤바꿀 방법을 찾을 때까지 상대방의 인생을 살아야 하는 처지에 놓인다.", "vn": "Người mẫu nam hàng đầu tự cao tự đại và cô nàng muốn thành người mẫu xinh đẹp buộc phải sống cuộc đời của nhau cho đến khi tìm được cách hoán đổi lại thân thể."}
title: My Runway
overview: An egotistic top male model and a pretty model wannabe are forced to live each other's lives until they figure out a way to undo their body switch.

titleTranslations: {"en": "U-Turn", "kr": "U-Turn", "vn": "U-Turn"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Ji Sub is coming back home after unsuccesfull audition. Sudden sound makes him stop his car. When he's looking into his trunk he discovers young woman, Yeon Hee, who doesn't remember anything about herself. Who is that girl and why did she appeared in front of Ji Sub?", "kr": "어느 날 한 남자(소지섭 분)의 차 트렁크에서 한 여자(이연희 분)가 발견되고, 남자가 여자를 자신의 집으로 데려오면서 펼쳐지는 이야기를 담고 있다.", "vn": "Ji Sub is coming back home after unsuccesfull audition. Sudden sound makes him stop his car. When he's looking into his trunk he discovers young woman, Yeon Hee, who doesn't remember anything about herself. Who is that girl and why did she appeared in front of Ji Sub?"}
title: U-Turn
overview: Ji Sub is coming back home after unsuccesfull audition. Sudden sound makes him stop his car. When he's looking into his trunk he discovers young woman, Yeon Hee, who doesn't remember anything about herself. Who is that girl and why did she appeared in front of Ji Sub?

titleTranslations: {"en": "Princess Ja Myung", "kr": "자명고", "vn": "Princess Ja Myung"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Based on a famous tale of Korean folklore story about a princess of Nak Rang of Nangnang Kingdom and Prince Hodong of the Goguryeo Kingdom.", "kr": "고구려 초 낙랑공주와 호동왕자의 설화를 배경으로 한 사극으로 호동왕자를 사이에 둔 낙랑공주와 언니 자명공주의 삼각스캔들을 그려내는 대하사극 드라마", "vn": "Based on a famous tale of Korean folklore story about a princess of Nak Rang of Nangnang Kingdom and Prince Hodong of the Goguryeo Kingdom."}
title: Princess Ja Myung
overview: Based on a famous tale of Korean folklore story about a princess of Nak Rang of Nangnang Kingdom and Prince Hodong of the Goguryeo Kingdom.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Love & Law", "kr": "Love & Law", "vn": "Love & Law"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Woo Lee-kyung worked at a major law firm as a secretary when she fell head-over-heels in love with Byun-hyuk, a rising star attorney in the firm. They fell madly in love with each other and ended up living together for three years. However, one day, Byun-hyuk decided to leave her, and all she had left were his law school books. The despaired Lee-kyung studied day and night with Byun-hyuk’s books, and soon passed the bar exam herself. Lee-kyung ends up opening her own tiny office with no employees. Her first task is to represent Han Min-kook, who winds up in a huge divorce lawsuit that could cost him an incredible sum of $100 million dollars. This case also lands Lee-kyung in a funny, cute tale of romance. Meanwhile, the story takes an odd twist when it is discovered that Han Min-kook’s ex-wife, Lee Ae-ri, is Lee-kyung’s good friend, and the lawyer representing Ae-ri is none other than Byun-hyuk himself. At the end of the day, Lee-kyung is left with the challenge of facing a showdown with her friend, Ae-ri, as well as her first love, Byun-hyuk.", "kr": "Woo Lee-kyung worked at a major law firm as a secretary when she fell head-over-heels in love with Byun-hyuk, a rising star attorney in the firm. title: Love & Law
overview: Woo Lee-kyung worked at a major law firm as a secretary when she fell head-over-heels in love with Byun-hyuk, a rising star attorney in the firm. They fell madly in love with each other and ended up living together for three years. However, one day, Byun-hyuk decided to leave her, and all she had left were his law school books. The despaired Lee-kyung studied day and night with Byun-hyuk’s books, and soon passed the bar exam herself. Lee-kyung ends up opening her own tiny office with no employees. Her first task is to represent Han Min-kook, who winds up in a huge divorce lawsuit that could cost him an incredible sum of $100 million dollars. This case also lands Lee-kyung in a funny, cute tale of romance. Meanwhile, the story takes an odd twist when it is discovered that Han Min-kook’s ex-wife, Lee Ae-ri, is Lee-kyung’s good friend, and the lawyer representing Ae-ri is none other than Byun-hyuk himself. At the end of the day, Lee-kyung is left with the challenge of facing a showdown with her friend, Ae-ri, as well as her first love, Byun-hyuk.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Jang Ok Jung, Living in Love", "kr": "Jang Ok Jung, Living in Love", "vn": "Tình Sử Jang Ok Jung"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Haute couture meets the high court in this drama based on Lady Jang Hui Bin, or Jang Ok Jung, one of the most celebrated royal concubines of the Joseon Dynasty. Lady Jang establishes herself as a coveted fashion designer who quickly finds herself sought after not only by fashionable noblewomen, but by the king himself. Political drama and the catwalk collide in this tale of fashioning dreams into reality!", "kr": "궁중 여인들의 식상한 암투 이야기가 아닌 숙종 이순의 정치적 카리스마와 절대 사랑, 그리고 전문적 궁중 직업인으로서 신분의 굴레를 뛰어넘고자 했던 여성 장옥정의 이야기를 재조명한 드라마", "vn": "Jang Hee Bin, một trong những phi tần hoàng gia nổi tiếng nhất của triều đại Joseon, người đứng sau việc phế truất vợ Vua Sukjong, Vương hậu In Hyeon. Tuy nhiên, không giống như vô số bộ phim truyền hình và điện ảnh về nhân vật phản diện nổi tiếng này, tác phẩm Tình sử Jang Ok Jung sẽ mang đến câu chuyện vào thời điểm cô còn là Nội nhân, trước khi trở thành Vương hậu kế tiếp của Vua Sukjong."}
title: Jang Ok Jung, Living in Love
overview: Haute couture meets the high court in this drama based on Lady Jang Hui Bin, or Jang Ok Jung, one of the most celebrated royal concubines of the Joseon Dynasty. Lady Jang establishes herself as a coveted fashion designer who quickly finds herself sought after not only by fashionable noblewomen, but by the king himself. Political drama and the catwalk collide in this tale of fashioning dreams into reality!

titleTranslations: {"en": "Agency", "kr": "대행사", "vn": "Công Ty Quảng Cáo"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A self-made executive navigates the cutthroat world of advertising, stopping at nothing — no matter how calculating — to become the head of her agency.", "kr": "대기업 광고대행사 최초로 여성 임원이 된 고아인이 최초를 넘어 최고의 위치까지 자신의 커리어를 만들어가는 과정을 그린 우아하게 처절한 오피스 드라마", "vn": "Tham Vọng: Từ một sinh viên tốt nghiệp một trường đại học ở nông thôn, bằng nỗ lực không ngừng nghỉ của mình, Go Ah In đã trở thành nữ giám đốc điều hành đầu tiên của VC Group. Đối trọng với Ah In là Choi Chang Soo, một người có xuất phát điểm hoàn toàn trái ngược với cô. Anh hy vọng sẽ đạt được vị trí CEO nhưng Go Ah In đã trở thành rào cản đầu tiên của anh. Dù đã có được vị trí mà mình mong muốn nhưng cả hai vẫn luôn ngấm ngầm đối đầu nhau."}
title: Agency
overview: A self-made executive navigates the cutthroat world of advertising, stopping at nothing — no matter how calculating — to become the head of her agency.

titleTranslations: {"en": "The Witch Store", "kr": "어서오세요, 마녀상점", "vn": "The Witch Store"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Hye Ji becomes a part-timer at the Witch Store which is only seen by those who have a wish. Hye Ji sees no progress in her relationship with Yoo Ho and in front of her, a witch transformed into a high school girl named YoungJi. This is when Sung Woo a handsome judo player appears.", "kr": "혜지는 간절한 소망을 가진 사람에게만 보이는 마녀상점의 아르바이트생이 된다. 유호와의 썸에 진전이 없는 혜지 앞에 여고생으로 변신한 마녀 영지, 훈남 유도선수 성우가 등장한다.", "vn": "Hye Ji becomes a part-timer at the Witch Store which is only seen by those who have a wish. Hye Ji sees no progress in her relationship with Yoo Ho and in front of her, a witch transformed into a high school girl named YoungJi. This is when Sung Woo a handsome judo player appears."}
title: The Witch Store
overview: Hye Ji becomes a part-timer at the Witch Store which is only seen by those who have a wish. Hye Ji sees no progress in her relationship with Yoo Ho and in front of her, a witch transformed into a high school girl named YoungJi. This is when Sung Woo a handsome judo player appears.

tagline: Will you be my bride once again?
titleTranslations: {"en": "The Story of Park's Marriage Contract", "kr": "The Story of Park's Marriage Contract", "vn": "Hợp Đồng Hôn Nhân Của Cô Park"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A woman travels from 19th century Joseon to modern-day Seoul, her fate takes a twist with a ‘fake marriage’ with a man who resembles her ex-husband.", "kr": "죽음을 뛰어넘어 2023년 대한민국에 당도한 19세기 욕망 유교걸 박연우와 21세기 무감정 끝판왕 강태하의 금쪽같은 계약 결혼 이야기. 김너울의 동명 웹소설 원작.", "vn": "A woman travels from 19th century Joseon to modern-day Seoul, her fate takes a twist with a ‘fake marriage’ with a man who resembles her ex-husband."}
title: The Story of Park's Marriage Contract
overview: A woman travels from 19th century Joseon to modern-day Seoul, her fate takes a twist with a ‘fake marriage’ with a man who resembles her ex-husband.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Secret Boutique", "kr": "Secret Boutique", "vn": "Cửa Hàng Bí Mật"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Jenny Jang is poor and works at bathhouse in Gangnam, Seoul. She starts a new job as a housemaid for a conglomerate family. She becomes successful and then runs J Boutique. She also begins work as a lobbyist. Jenny Jang gets involved in an international city development project.", "kr": "강남 목욕탕 세신사에서 재벌인 데오가(家)의 하녀로, 또다시 정재계 비선 실세로 거듭 성장한 ‘제니장’이 국제도시개발이란 황금알을 손에 쥐고 데오가 여제(女帝) 자리를 노리는 이야기", "vn": "Đây là một bộ phim về sức mạnh của phụ nữ và giới thượng lưu khi họ tham nhũng để tìm kiếm quyền lực và tiền tài. Nội dung xoay quanh người phụ nữ nghèo tên là Jenny Jang (Kim Sun A), cô ta làm việc tại nhà tắm ở Gangnam, Seoul. Một ngày nọ, cô bắt đầu công việc mới với tư cách là người giúp việc cho một gia đình tập đoàn. Sau đó cô trở nên thành công và điều hành một cửa hàng thời trang J Boutique. Cô cũng bắt đầu vận động hành lang để được tham gia vào một dự án phát triển thành phố quốc tế."}
title: Secret Boutique
overview: Jenny Jang is poor and works at bathhouse in Gangnam, Seoul. She starts a new job as a housemaid for a conglomerate family. She becomes successful and then runs J Boutique. She also begins work as a lobbyist. Jenny Jang gets involved in an international city development project.

tagline: Hyo-sim, a devoted daughter, and her journey to independence.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Live Your Own Life", "kr": "효심이네 각자도생", "vn": "Live Your Own Life"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "The story of Hyo-sim, who sacrificed her life for her family trying to lead an independent life as she began to value herself.", "kr": "심성 따뜻한 효심이가 자신을 힘들게 했던 가족들에게서 벗어나 자신의 인생을 찾아가는 이야기", "vn": "The story of Hyo-sim, who sacrificed her life for her family trying to lead an independent life as she began to value herself."}
title: Live Your Own Life
overview: The story of Hyo-sim, who sacrificed her life for her family trying to lead an independent life as she began to value herself.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Face Me", "kr": "페이스 미", "vn": "Đối Mặt"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A medical mystery thriller that traces the truth of the incident of a famous plastic surgeon, who had a reputation as a righteous man, who fell into the abyss after being caught up in an unexpected incident and underwent reconstructive plastic surgery for crime victims.", "kr": "의느님으로 명성을 떨치던 유명 성형외과 의사가 뜻밖의 사건에 휘말려 나락으로 떨어지게 되고 범죄피해자 재건 성형을 하게 되면서 사건의 진실을 추적해가는 메디컬 미스테리 드라마", "vn": "Là bộ phim thuộc đề tài y khoa kết hợp phá án, Đối Mặt xoay quanh bác sĩ Cha Jeong Woo và cảnh sát Lee Min Hyung. Là một chuyên gia có tay nghề cao, Cha Jeong Woo là bác sĩ hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực phẫu thuật thẩm mỹ. Sau một sự cố đe dọa hủy hoại sự nghiệp, anh tình nguyện đi phẫu thuật tạo hình cho nạn nhân án hình sự. Nhờ đó mà Jeong Woo gặp được nữ cảnh sát nhiệt huyết Lee Min Hyung và bắt đầu hỗ trợ cô khám phá ra sự thật đằng sau những vụ án hóc búa."}
title: Face Me
overview: A medical mystery thriller that traces the truth of the incident of a famous plastic surgeon, who had a reputation as a righteous man, who fell into the abyss after being caught up in an unexpected incident and underwent reconstructive plastic surgery for crime victims.

tagline: A kiss can change everything.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Kiss Sixth Sense", "kr": "키스 식스 센스", "vn": "Nụ Hôn Của Giác Quan Thứ Sáu"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Hong Ye-sul, a competent account executive at an advertising company, has one secret— she can see the future when her lips come into contact with another person. When Ye-sul accidentally kisses her stern team chief Cha Min-hu, she sees the impossible: herself in bed with him some time in the future. To add to her confusion and frustration, her ex-boyfriend Lee Pil-yo is attempting to win back her heart, shaking her life up even more.", "kr": "제우기획 기획1팀 에이스 AE인 홍예술에게는 비밀이 한 가지 있다. 그것은 바로 타인의 신체에 입술이 닿으면 미래가 보인느 능력을 가지고 있다는 것. 어느 날 예술은 끔찍하게 여기던 상사 민후와 사고로 입술이 닿게 되고 그와 함께하는 30금 미래를 보게 된다. 게다가 전남자친구 필요까지 돌아와 예술에게 다시 한 번 기회를 달라고 한다.", "vn": "Được chuyển thể từ tiểu thuyết mạng và sau đó chuyển thành webtoon. Tác phẩm được yêu thích nhờ xây dựng hình tượng nhân vật hài hước, độc đáo. Chuyện phim sẽ tập trung nhân vật chính, người sở hữu những khả năng liên quan đến giác quan của họ. Đó là Hong Ye Sul (Seo Ji Hye thủ vai) người phụ nữ có thể nhìn thấy tương lai mỗi khi cô hôn ai đó. Một ngày kia, người cô vô tình hôn không ai khác chính là Cha Min Hoo (Yoon Kye Sang đóng), sếp của cô và điều mà cô thấy về tương lai của cả hai chính là lên giường cùng nhau. Cũng từ đây mà chuyện tình Nụ Hôn Của Giác Quan Thứ Sáu chính thức bắt đầu."}
title: Kiss Sixth Sense
overview: Hong Ye-sul, a competent account executive at an advertising company, has one secret— she can see the future when her lips come into contact with another person. When Ye-sul accidentally kisses her stern team chief Cha Min-hu, she sees the impossible: herself in bed with him some time in the future. To add to her confusion and frustration, her ex-boyfriend Lee Pil-yo is attempting to win back her heart, shaking her life up even more.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Doubt", "kr": "이토록 친밀한 배신자", "vn": "Nghi Phạm Cận Kề"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "A criminal profiler begins questioning everything he’s ever believed about seeking justice after learning his daughter is linked to a murder case.", "kr": "국내 최고의 프로파일러가 수사 중인 살인사건에 얽힌 딸의 비밀과 마주하고, 처절하게 무너져가며 심연 속의 진실을 쫓는 부녀 스릴러", "vn": "Một chuyên gia phân tích tội phạm bắt đầu đặt câu hỏi về mọi thứ anh từng tin về việc tìm kiếm công lý sau khi biết con gái mình có liên quan đến một vụ án giết người."}
title: Doubt
overview: A criminal profiler begins questioning everything he’s ever believed about seeking justice after learning his daughter is linked to a murder case.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Only You", "kr": "온리 유", "vn": "Only You"}
overviewTranslations:
{"en": "Eun Jae was a stubborn and head-strong girl who had a passion for cooking. She did not have any interest in going to college and with the help of her highschool friend, Jung Hyun Sung ran away to Italy to enroll in a cooking school. Jung Hyun Sung who loved her dearly went along with her.

Han Yi Joon came from a wealthy family. He travelled to Italy looking for his mother and there he ran into Eun Jae, who had also been seeking the same person to learn the secrets to making great pasta. She comforted Yi Joon, who was distraught over his mother's remarrying, and they ended up making love. Yi Joon left Eun Jae the next morning over some misunderstanding. Eun Jae became pregnant and had no choice but to give up her dream and to return to Korea. 6 years later, Eun Jae was working in low paying restaurant jobs, Yi Joon started to take over the operations of his family's business", "kr": "우리는 간절히 사랑을 꿈꾼다. 운명적이고 영원한 사랑을... 하지만 그런 사랑은 나뿐만 아니라 다른 사람들에게도 흔하지 않다. 사랑하지 않으려고 애를 쓰면 쓸수록 빨려 들어가고, 미워하려고 발버둥치면 칠수록 깊어지는 그런 달콤하고 아픈 사랑을, 누구나 숨쉬는 동안은 끊임없이 원하는 그런 독하고도 아름다운 사랑을 그려보고자 한다. 사랑은 달콤한 꿈이기에...

재벌 후계자인줄 모르고 만난 남자와의 짧은 만남. 치명적이고도 아름다운 사랑에 빠지게 되지만 커다란 아픔을 겪고 6년간의 기다림 후에 그 남자와 다시 만나 사랑을 하게 되는 운명적인 사랑 이야기.  사랑은 달콤한 꿈! 운명이 부르는 단 하나의 사랑! 공부보다 요리가 좋아 입시는 뒷전인 차은재는 부모님 몰래 요리 대회에 나가 우승을 하게 되어 부상으로 이탈리아 요리학교로 연수를 가게 되고, 스파게티의 비법을 얻기 위해 과거 하숙집 주인을 찾아 나서지만 이미 비법의 주인공은 이사를 가버렸고 돈도 떨어져 버린 은재 앞에 자신과 동일한 사람ㅇ르 찾는 도도하고 거만하기 짝이 없는 한이준이 나타난다. 그러나 은재는 자신도 모르게 이 남자에게 마음을 열고 달콤한 사랑을 나누게 되지만 다음날 아침 갑자기 들이닥친 현성에 의해 이준은 그를 은재의 애인으로 오해한 채 한국으로 돌아가 버리는데.. 운명이라는 이름아래 얽혀진 이들의 만남.. 그러나 단 하나의 사랑은 이미 시작되었다.", "vn": "Eun Jae was a stubborn and head-strong girl who had a passion for cooking. She did not have any interest in going to college and with the help of her highschool friend, Jung Hyun Sung ran away to Italy to enroll in a cooking school. Jung Hyun Sung who loved her dearly went along with her.

Han Yi Joon came from a wealthy family. He travelled to Italy looking for his mother and there he ran into Eun Jae, who had also been seeking the same person to learn the secrets to making great pasta. She comforted Yi Joon, who was distraught over his mother's remarrying, and they ended up making love. Yi Joon left Eun Jae the next morning over some misunderstanding. Eun Jae became pregnant and had no choice but to give up her dream and to return to Korea. 6 years later, Eun Jae was working in low paying restaurant jobs, Yi Joon started to take over the operations of his family's business"}
title: Only You
overview:
Eun Jae was a stubborn and head-strong girl who had a passion for cooking. She did not have any interest in going to college and with the help of her highschool friend, Jung Hyun Sung ran away to Italy to enroll in a cooking school. Jung Hyun Sung who loved her dearly went along with her.

Han Yi Joon came from a wealthy family. He travelled to Italy looking for his mother and there he ran into Eun Jae, who had also been seeking the same person to learn the secrets to making great pasta. She comforted Yi Joon, who was distraught over his mother's remarrying, and they ended up making love. Yi Joon left Eun Jae the next morning over some misunderstanding. Eun Jae became pregnant and had no choice but to give up her dream and to return to Korea. 6 years later, Eun Jae was working in low paying restaurant jobs, Yi Joon started to take over the operations of his family's business

tagline: An exciting error interrupts their perfectly structured life.
titleTranslations: {"en": "Semantic Error", "kr": "시맨틱 에러", "vn": "Semantic Error"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Chu Sang Woo is a computer science student who prizes reason, rules, and a rigid sense of what is right above all else. As part of his university work he needs to work on a group project for the liberal arts, where the group is required to make a final presentation in order to pass. But as the rest of the group decided to leave all the work to him, he decides to remove their names, and make the presentation in his name. But little did he know he would deal a heavy blow to the academic prospects of a senior student named Jang Jae Young, a design major and Chu Sang Woo’s polar opposite. He is stylish, fun-loving, and – above all – extraordinarily popular. But when his credit for the liberal arts project is taken away, his grand plans to study abroad are suddenly thrown up into the air. He seeks out Chu Sang Woo and is of a mind to torment him. But when the duo is forced to work together, a strange attraction starts to develop between them.", "kr": "컴공과 아싸 추상우의 완벽하게 짜인 일상에 에러처럼 나타난 안하무인 디자인과 인싸 장재영, 극과 극 청춘들의 캠퍼스 로맨스를 그린 왓챠 오리지널 드라마", "vn": "Chu Sang Woo is a computer science student who prizes reason, rules, and a rigid sense of what is right above all else. As part of his university work he needs to work on a group project for the liberal arts, where the group is required to make a final presentation in order to pass. But as the rest of the group decided to leave all the work to him, he decides to remove their names, and make the presentation in his name. But little did he know he would deal a heavy blow to the academic prospects of a senior student named Jang Jae Young, a design major and Chu Sang Woo’s polar opposite. He is stylish, fun-loving, and – above all – extraordinarily popular. But when his credit for the liberal arts project is taken away, his grand plans to study abroad are suddenly thrown up into the air. He seeks out Chu Sang Woo and is of a mind to torment him. But when the duo is forced to work together, a strange attraction starts to develop between them."}
title: Semantic Error
overview: Chu Sang Woo is a computer science student who prizes reason, rules, and a rigid sense of what is right above all else. As part of his university work he needs to work on a group project for the liberal arts, where the group is required to make a final presentation in order to pass. But as the rest of the group decided to leave all the work to him, he decides to remove their names, and make the presentation in his name. But little did he know he would deal a heavy blow to the academic prospects of a senior student named Jang Jae Young, a design major and Chu Sang Woo’s polar opposite. He is stylish, fun-loving, and – above all – extraordinarily popular. But when his credit for the liberal arts project is taken away, his grand plans to study abroad are suddenly thrown up into the air. He seeks out Chu Sang Woo and is of a mind to torment him. But when the duo is forced to work together, a strange attraction starts to develop between them.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Oh! Youngsim", "kr": "오! 영심이", "vn": "Chuyện Tình Của Young Sim"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Oh Young-Sim is single and in her 30's. She has worked as a TV variety show PD for 8 years. She wants to make people laugh with her TV shows, but they were always cancelled due to low popularity ratings. Her career is now in a crisis.", "kr": "누가 시키지도 않았는데 인생과 사랑에 열병 들었던 질풍노도의 사춘기, '중2병'이라는 말이 태어나기 전에 있었던 영심이의 30대 이야기.", "vn": "Oh! Young Shim xoay quanh câu chuyện kể về Oh Young Shim (Song Ha Yoon thủ vai) là một đạo diễn chương trình truyền hình có sự nghiệp đang rơi vào khủng hoảng. Cô nhận được một ‘chiếc phao cứu sinh’ cuối cùng là cơ hội sản xuất một chương trình thực tế về chủ đề tình yêu. Trong số khách mời do Young Shim chọn đề xuất hiện trên show, có một chủ tịch công ty start-up nổi tiếng tên Mark Wang (Lee Dong Hae đóng)."}
title: Oh! Youngsim
overview: Oh Young-Sim is single and in her 30's. She has worked as a TV variety show PD for 8 years. She wants to make people laugh with her TV shows, but they were always cancelled due to low popularity ratings. Her career is now in a crisis.

tagline: We are neither kids nor adults. When do we become adults then?
titleTranslations: {"en": "Everything and Nothing", "kr": "17세의 조건", "vn": "Everything and Nothing"}
overviewTranslations: {"en": "Min-jae and Seo-yeon are no different from ordinary 17-year-old high school students. Min-jae is silent and sensitive, yet a good student. Seo-yeon who plays the piano wished to enter an arts high school but failed. As they grow into adults, their surroundings and the reality they face get harsher. These two somehow similar but different friends get closer as they overcome their growing pains together.", "kr": "“상태가 불안정해 폭발하기 쉽다” 애도 어른도 아닌 나이 17세. 평범한 고등학생 민재와 서연이 겪는 아픔과 성장을 그린 단편 드라마", "vn": "Min-jae and Seo-yeon are no different from ordinary 17-year-old high school students. Min-jae is silent and sensitive, yet a good student. Seo-yeon who plays the piano wished to enter an arts high school but failed. As they grow into adults, their surroundings and the reality they face get harsher. These two somehow similar but different friends get closer as they overcome their growing pains together."}
title: Everything and Nothing
overview: Min-jae and Seo-yeon are no different from ordinary 17-year-old high school students. Min-jae is silent and sensitive, yet a good student. Seo-yeon who plays the piano wished to enter an arts high school but failed. As they grow into adults, their surroundings and the reality they face get harsher. These two somehow similar but different friends get closer as they overcome their growing pains together.

titleTranslations: {"en": "Ghostderella", "kr": "Ghostderella", "vn": "Ghostderella"}
